0.000	1.400	Stave
1.400	1.480	one
1.480	2.040	of
2.040	2.280	A
2.280	2.680	Christmas
2.680	2.960	Carol
2.960	3.000	by
3.000	4.000	Charles
4.000	4.040	Dickens
4.040	4.480	This
4.480	4.600	is
4.600	4.720	a
4.720	5.320	Librivox
5.320	5.800	Recording.
5.800	6.560	All
6.560	7.200	Librivox
7.200	7.880	Recordings
7.880	8.000	are
8.000	8.200	in
8.200	8.400	the
8.400	8.760	Public
8.760	10.040	Domain.
10.040	10.280	For
10.280	10.440	more
10.440	11.320	information
11.320	11.520	or
11.520	11.640	to
11.640	12.880	volunteer
12.880	13.200	please
13.200	14.760	visit
14.760	21.000	A
21.000	21.440	Christmas
21.440	22.640	Carol
22.640	22.800	by
22.800	23.240	Charles
23.240	25.680	Dickens
25.680	28.040	Preface
28.040	28.120	I
28.120	28.440	HAVE
28.440	28.720	endeavoured
28.720	28.840	in
28.840	29.000	this
29.000	29.480	Ghostly
29.480	30.000	little
30.000	30.480	book,
30.480	30.640	to
30.640	31.080	raise
31.080	31.280	the
31.280	31.640	Ghost
31.640	31.720	of
31.720	31.800	an
31.800	32.360	Idea,
32.360	32.960	which
32.960	33.240	shall
33.240	33.560	not
33.560	33.680	put
33.680	33.840	my
33.840	34.200	readers
34.200	34.280	out
34.280	34.440	of
34.440	34.760	humour
34.760	34.960	with
34.960	36.000	themselves,
36.000	36.160	with
36.160	36.280	each
36.280	37.120	other,
37.120	37.240	with
37.240	37.320	the
37.320	38.360	season,
38.360	38.480	or
38.480	38.720	with
38.720	39.880	me.
39.880	40.000	May
40.000	40.160	it
40.160	40.480	haunt
40.480	40.720	their
40.720	41.160	houses
41.160	41.720	pleasantly,
41.720	42.440	and
42.440	42.600	no
42.600	42.800	one
42.800	43.040	wish
43.040	43.240	to
43.240	43.360	lay
43.360	43.600	it.
43.600	44.520	Their
44.520	44.960	faithful
44.960	45.360	Friend
45.360	45.560	and
45.560	46.920	Servant,
46.920	47.280	C.
47.280	47.440	D.
47.440	48.640	December,
48.640	53.440	1843.
53.440	53.880	Stave
53.880	55.280	1:
55.280	55.840	Marley’s
55.840	58.040	Ghost
58.040	58.840	Marley
58.840	59.160	was
59.160	59.880	dead:
59.880	60.000	to
60.000	60.280	begin
60.280	60.600	with.
60.600	61.880	There
61.880	62.040	is
62.040	62.360	no
62.360	62.600	doubt
62.600	63.120	whatever
63.120	63.520	about
63.520	63.840	that.
63.840	64.680	The
64.680	65.280	register
65.280	65.480	of
65.480	65.600	his
65.600	66.120	burial
66.120	66.440	was
66.440	66.840	signed
66.840	67.000	by
67.000	67.120	the
67.120	67.680	clergyman,
67.680	68.160	the
68.160	68.920	clerk,
68.920	69.080	the
69.080	69.720	undertaker,
69.720	70.280	and
70.280	70.480	the
70.480	70.760	chief
70.760	72.280	mourner.
72.280	72.880	Scrooge
72.880	73.320	signed
73.320	73.600	it:
73.600	73.840	and
73.840	74.360	Scrooge’s
74.360	74.680	name
74.680	74.840	was
74.840	75.040	good
75.040	75.400	upon
75.400	75.960	‘Change,
75.960	76.080	for
76.080	76.560	anything
76.560	76.720	he
76.720	77.000	chose
77.000	77.200	to
77.200	77.360	put
77.360	77.480	his
77.480	77.840	hand
77.840	78.040	to.
78.040	79.280	Old
79.280	80.200	Marley
80.200	80.240	was
80.240	80.520	as
80.520	80.880	dead
80.880	81.000	as
81.000	81.200	a
81.200	83.040	door-nail.
83.040	83.400	Mind!
83.400	84.080	I
84.080	84.320	don’t
84.320	84.480	mean
84.480	84.560	to
84.560	84.840	say
84.840	85.040	that
85.040	85.240	I
85.240	85.480	know,
85.480	86.160	of
86.160	86.400	my
86.400	86.560	own
86.560	87.360	knowledge,
87.360	87.760	what
87.760	87.960	there
87.960	88.200	is
88.200	89.040	particularly
89.040	89.440	dead
89.440	89.560	about
89.560	89.680	a
89.680	91.040	door-nail.
91.040	91.320	I
91.320	91.480	might
91.480	91.680	have
91.680	91.800	been
91.800	92.440	inclined,
92.440	93.400	myself,
93.400	93.480	to
93.480	93.880	regard
93.880	94.040	a
94.040	94.760	coffin-nail
94.760	94.960	as
94.960	95.160	the
95.160	95.640	deadest
95.640	95.920	piece
95.920	96.000	of
96.000	96.680	ironmongery
96.680	96.840	in
96.840	96.960	the
96.960	98.280	trade.
98.280	98.400	But
98.400	98.520	the
98.520	99.000	wisdom
99.000	99.120	of
99.120	99.400	our
99.400	100.200	ancestors
100.200	100.440	is
100.440	100.640	in
100.640	100.720	the
100.720	102.000	simile;
102.000	102.160	and
102.160	102.480	my
102.480	103.040	unhallowed
103.040	103.440	hands
103.440	103.640	shall
103.640	104.000	not
104.000	104.280	disturb
104.280	104.960	it,
104.960	105.000	or
105.000	105.240	the
105.240	105.560	Country’s
105.560	105.800	done
105.800	107.280	for.
107.280	107.440	You
107.440	108.000	will
108.000	108.400	therefore
108.400	109.320	permit
109.320	109.520	me
109.520	109.680	to
109.680	110.680	repeat,
110.680	112.360	emphatically,
112.360	112.560	that
112.560	113.560	Marley
113.560	113.640	was
113.640	113.920	as
113.920	114.680	dead
114.680	114.880	as
114.880	115.040	a
115.040	116.280	door-nail.
116.280	116.800	Scrooge
116.800	117.040	knew
117.040	117.120	he
117.120	117.320	was
117.320	118.120	dead?
118.120	118.160	Of
118.160	118.520	course
118.520	118.680	he
118.680	119.400	did.
119.400	119.480	How
119.480	119.560	could
119.560	119.800	it
119.800	119.880	be
119.880	120.520	otherwise?
120.520	121.480	Scrooge
121.480	121.600	and
121.600	121.800	he
121.800	121.960	were
121.960	122.520	partners
122.520	122.720	for
122.720	122.920	I
122.920	123.120	don’t
123.120	123.320	know
123.320	123.520	how
123.520	123.760	many
123.760	124.240	years.
124.240	125.920	Scrooge
125.920	126.120	was
126.120	126.280	his
126.280	126.560	sole
126.560	127.120	executor,
127.120	127.760	his
127.760	128.080	sole
128.080	129.080	administrator,
129.080	129.480	his
129.480	129.920	sole
129.920	130.880	assign,
130.880	131.040	his
131.040	131.480	sole
131.480	132.320	residuary
132.320	133.600	legatee,
133.600	133.760	his
133.760	134.000	sole
134.000	135.080	friend
135.080	135.280	and
135.280	135.640	sole
135.640	135.960	mourner.
135.960	136.960	And
136.960	137.200	even
137.200	137.800	Scrooge
137.800	137.960	was
137.960	138.160	not
138.160	138.400	so
138.400	139.080	dreadfully
139.080	139.280	cut
139.280	139.320	up
139.320	139.520	by
139.520	139.680	the
139.680	139.880	sad
139.880	140.200	event,
140.200	140.600	but
140.600	141.200	that
141.200	141.400	he
141.400	141.760	was
141.760	142.040	an
142.040	142.640	excellent
142.640	142.880	man
142.880	142.960	of
142.960	143.600	business
143.600	143.800	on
143.800	143.920	the
143.920	144.560	very
144.560	144.840	day
144.840	144.880	of
144.880	145.040	the
145.040	145.560	funeral,
145.560	146.160	and
146.160	146.960	solemnised
146.960	147.200	it
147.200	147.520	with
147.520	147.800	an
147.800	148.440	undoubted
148.440	150.280	bargain.
150.280	150.400	The
150.400	150.800	mention
150.800	150.920	of
150.920	151.360	Marley’s
151.360	152.000	funeral
152.000	152.400	brings
152.400	152.480	me
152.480	152.760	back
152.760	152.880	to
152.880	153.040	the
153.040	153.280	point
153.280	153.400	I
153.400	153.840	started
153.840	154.120	from.
154.120	155.040	There
155.040	155.240	is
155.240	155.480	no
155.480	155.760	doubt
155.760	156.320	that
156.320	156.880	Marley
156.880	157.160	was
157.160	158.360	dead.
158.360	158.640	This
158.640	158.920	must
158.920	159.040	be
159.040	160.080	distinctly
160.080	161.080	understood,
161.080	161.320	or
161.320	161.880	nothing
161.880	162.520	wonderful
162.520	162.680	can
162.680	162.920	come
162.920	163.040	of
163.040	163.120	the
163.120	163.640	story
163.640	163.840	I
163.840	163.960	am
163.960	164.160	going
164.160	164.440	to
164.440	164.720	relate.
164.720	165.560	If
165.560	165.680	we
165.680	165.840	were
165.840	166.120	not
166.120	166.680	perfectly
166.680	167.200	convinced
167.200	167.480	that
167.480	167.840	Hamlet’s
167.840	168.280	Father
168.280	168.680	died
168.680	169.040	before
169.040	169.200	the
169.200	169.560	play
169.560	169.960	began,
169.960	170.760	there
170.760	170.960	would
170.960	171.040	be
171.040	171.440	nothing
171.440	171.640	more
171.640	172.320	remarkable
172.320	172.480	in
172.480	172.600	his
172.600	173.000	taking
173.000	173.080	a
173.080	173.440	stroll
173.440	173.600	at
173.600	173.920	night,
173.920	174.280	in
174.280	174.440	an
174.440	174.880	easterly
174.880	175.640	wind,
175.640	176.000	upon
176.000	176.120	his
176.120	176.320	own
176.320	177.040	ramparts,
177.040	177.840	than
177.840	178.000	there
178.000	178.320	would
178.320	178.520	be
178.520	178.800	in
178.800	179.120	any
179.120	179.360	other
179.360	179.920	middle-aged
179.920	180.400	gentleman
180.400	181.000	rashly
181.000	181.280	turning
181.280	181.520	out
181.520	181.800	after
181.800	182.120	dark
182.120	182.120	in
182.120	182.240	a
182.240	182.640	breezy
182.640	183.160	spot
183.160	183.160	—
183.160	184.200	say
184.200	184.560	Saint
184.560	184.880	Paul’s
184.880	185.640	Churchyard
185.640	185.760	for
185.760	186.920	instance
186.920	186.920	—
186.920	187.600	literally
187.600	188.000	to
188.000	188.640	astonish
188.640	188.760	his
188.760	189.360	son’s
189.360	189.560	weak
189.560	190.160	mind.
190.160	192.120	Scrooge
192.120	192.360	never
192.360	192.760	painted
192.760	193.040	out
193.040	193.360	Old
193.360	193.840	Marley’s
193.840	194.200	name.
194.200	195.360	There
195.360	195.480	it
195.480	196.040	stood,
196.040	197.120	years
197.120	197.920	afterwards,
197.920	198.440	above
198.440	198.600	the
198.600	199.200	warehouse
199.200	200.080	door:
200.080	201.240	Scrooge
201.240	201.520	and
201.520	202.880	Marley.
202.880	203.200	The
203.200	203.520	firm
203.520	203.720	was
203.720	204.080	known
204.080	204.600	as
204.600	205.360	Scrooge
205.360	205.480	and
205.480	206.840	Marley.
206.840	207.480	Sometimes
207.480	207.760	people
207.760	208.000	new
208.000	208.040	to
208.040	208.240	the
208.240	208.600	business
208.600	208.960	called
208.960	209.560	Scrooge
209.560	210.440	Scrooge,
210.440	210.720	and
210.720	211.240	sometimes
211.240	211.680	Marley,
211.680	211.960	but
211.960	212.160	he
212.160	212.480	answered
212.480	212.520	to
212.520	212.880	both
212.880	213.360	names:
213.360	213.720	it
213.720	214.040	was
214.040	214.360	all
214.360	214.440	the
214.440	214.960	same
214.960	216.280	to
216.280	216.720	him.
216.720	216.960	Oh!
216.960	217.120	But
217.120	217.240	he
217.240	217.480	was
217.480	217.680	a
217.680	218.520	tight-fisted
218.520	218.800	hand
218.800	218.880	at
218.880	219.160	the
219.160	219.880	grind-stone,
219.880	220.760	Scrooge!
220.760	220.960	a
220.960	221.920	squeezing,
221.920	222.640	wrenching,
222.640	223.520	grasping,
223.520	224.480	scraping,
224.480	225.320	clutching,
225.320	225.920	covetous,
225.920	226.200	old
226.200	226.960	sinner!
226.960	227.400	Hard
227.400	227.840	and
227.840	228.080	sharp
228.080	228.440	as
228.440	228.920	flint,
228.920	229.360	from
229.360	229.600	which
229.600	229.920	no
229.920	230.440	steel
230.440	230.520	had
230.520	230.960	ever
230.960	231.520	struck
231.520	231.960	out
231.960	232.360	generous
232.360	233.000	fire;
233.000	233.680	secret,
233.680	233.960	and
233.960	235.080	self-contained,
235.080	235.440	and
235.440	236.320	solitary
236.320	236.480	as
236.480	236.560	an
236.560	236.920	oyster.
236.920	237.080	The
237.080	238.440	cold
238.440	238.800	within
238.800	239.000	him
239.000	239.640	froze
239.640	239.840	his
239.840	240.160	old
240.160	240.640	features,
240.640	241.480	nipped
241.480	241.720	his
241.720	242.160	pointed
242.160	242.680	nose,
242.680	243.520	shriveled
243.520	243.760	his
243.760	244.360	cheek,
244.360	244.920	stiffened
244.920	245.240	his
245.240	245.560	gait;
245.560	245.960	made
245.960	246.120	his
246.120	246.600	eyes
246.600	247.120	red,
247.120	247.400	his
247.400	247.840	thin
247.840	248.240	lips
248.240	248.640	blue
248.640	248.960	and
248.960	249.520	spoke
249.520	250.000	out
250.000	250.640	shrewdly
250.640	250.720	in
250.720	250.960	his
250.960	251.560	grating
251.560	252.640	voice.
252.640	252.760	A
252.760	253.280	frosty
253.280	253.720	rime
253.720	253.920	was
253.920	254.120	on
254.120	254.240	his
254.240	254.560	head,
254.560	255.080	and
255.080	255.240	on
255.240	255.400	his
255.400	255.960	eyebrows,
255.960	256.760	and
256.760	256.920	his
256.920	257.480	wiry
257.480	258.640	chin.
258.640	258.800	He
258.800	259.200	carried
259.200	259.440	his
259.440	259.920	own
259.920	260.320	low
260.320	260.800	temperature
260.800	261.480	always
261.480	261.800	about
261.800	261.840	with
261.840	262.600	him;
262.600	262.800	he
262.800	263.160	iced
263.160	263.400	his
263.400	264.120	office
264.120	264.400	in
264.400	264.680	the
264.680	266.000	dogdays;
266.000	266.160	and
266.160	266.440	didn’t
266.440	266.680	thaw
266.680	266.960	it
266.960	267.400	one
267.400	268.160	degree
268.160	268.400	at
268.400	270.640	Christmas.
270.640	271.160	External
271.160	271.560	heat
271.560	271.680	and
271.680	272.120	cold
272.120	272.440	had
272.440	272.640	little
272.640	273.160	influence
273.160	273.320	on
273.320	274.480	Scrooge.
274.480	274.840	No
274.840	275.480	warmth
275.480	275.760	could
275.760	275.920	warm,
275.920	276.800	no
276.800	277.360	wintry
277.360	277.880	weather
277.880	278.320	chill
278.320	279.240	him.
279.240	279.480	No
279.480	279.720	wind
279.720	279.920	that
279.920	280.320	blew
280.320	280.640	was
280.640	281.280	bitterer
281.280	281.560	than
281.560	281.880	he,
281.880	282.360	no
282.360	282.880	falling
282.880	283.320	snow
283.320	283.640	was
283.640	283.880	more
283.880	284.520	intent
284.520	284.840	upon
284.840	284.960	its
284.960	285.600	purpose,
285.600	286.040	no
286.040	286.480	pelting
286.480	286.920	rain
286.920	287.560	less
287.560	288.000	open
288.000	288.160	to
288.160	289.320	entreaty.
289.320	289.640	Foul
289.640	289.840	weather
289.840	290.200	didn’t
290.200	290.400	know
290.400	290.720	where
290.720	291.000	to
291.000	291.680	have
291.680	291.840	him.
291.840	291.880	The
291.880	292.360	heaviest
292.360	292.640	rain,
292.640	293.080	and
293.080	293.360	snow,
293.360	293.840	and
293.840	294.080	hail,
294.080	294.440	and
294.440	294.800	sleet,
294.800	295.360	could
295.360	295.560	boast
295.560	295.640	of
295.640	295.800	the
295.800	296.320	advantage
296.320	296.840	over
296.840	297.160	him
297.160	297.200	in
297.200	297.640	only
297.640	298.080	one
298.080	298.680	respect.
298.680	299.480	They
299.480	300.240	often
300.240	300.640	“came
300.640	301.080	down”
301.080	301.680	handsomely,
301.680	302.680	and
302.680	303.520	Scrooge
303.520	303.800	never
303.800	305.160	did.
305.160	305.480	Nobody
305.480	305.640	ever
305.640	306.080	stopped
306.080	306.240	him
306.240	306.360	in
306.360	306.440	the
306.440	306.840	street
306.840	306.920	to
306.920	307.160	say,
307.160	307.920	with
307.920	308.480	gladsome
308.480	308.680	looks,
308.680	309.480	“My
309.480	309.840	dear
309.840	310.520	Scrooge,
310.520	310.920	how
310.920	311.320	are
311.320	311.640	you?
311.640	311.960	When
311.960	312.280	will
312.280	312.600	you
312.600	312.880	come
312.880	312.920	to
312.920	313.280	see
313.280	314.080	me?”
314.080	314.200	No
314.200	314.600	beggars
314.600	315.160	implored
315.160	315.320	him
315.320	315.360	to
315.360	315.880	bestow
315.880	315.960	a
315.960	316.480	trifle,
316.480	317.000	no
317.000	317.600	children
317.600	318.040	asked
318.040	318.320	him
318.320	318.720	what
318.720	318.800	it
318.800	319.320	was
319.320	319.640	o’clock,
319.640	320.400	no
320.400	320.880	man
320.880	321.040	or
321.040	321.480	woman
321.480	321.840	ever
321.840	322.520	once
322.520	322.640	in
322.640	322.720	all
322.720	322.960	his
322.960	323.520	life
323.520	324.600	inquired
324.600	324.800	the
324.800	325.320	way
325.320	325.440	to
325.440	325.800	such
325.800	326.160	and
326.160	326.440	such
326.440	326.480	a
326.480	326.800	place,
326.800	327.280	of
327.280	328.880	Scrooge.
328.880	329.280	Even
329.280	329.280	the
329.280	329.760	blind
329.760	330.000	men’s
330.000	330.480	dogs
330.480	330.920	appeared
330.920	331.040	to
331.040	331.280	know
331.280	331.440	him;
331.440	331.480	and
331.480	332.160	when
332.160	332.360	they
332.360	332.680	saw
332.680	332.920	him
332.920	333.240	coming
333.240	333.400	on,
333.400	334.040	would
334.040	334.240	tug
334.240	334.360	their
334.360	334.800	owners
334.800	335.120	into
335.120	335.960	doorways
335.960	336.160	and
336.160	336.320	up
336.320	336.920	courts;
336.920	337.240	and
337.240	337.480	then
337.480	337.720	would
337.720	338.120	wag
338.120	338.240	their
338.240	338.760	tails
338.760	338.920	as
338.920	339.080	though
339.080	339.240	they
339.240	339.480	said,
339.480	340.520	“No
340.520	340.800	eye
340.800	341.040	at
341.040	341.160	all
341.160	341.320	is
341.320	341.640	better
341.640	341.840	than
341.840	341.920	an
341.920	342.280	evil
342.280	342.400	eye,
342.400	342.880	dark
342.880	343.440	master!”
343.440	344.320	But
344.320	344.640	what
344.640	344.760	did
344.760	345.240	Scrooge
345.240	346.360	care?
346.360	346.360	It
346.360	346.560	was
346.560	346.680	the
346.680	346.960	very
346.960	347.280	thing
347.280	347.520	he
347.520	348.080	liked.
348.080	348.800	To
348.800	349.000	edge
349.000	349.160	his
349.160	349.480	way
349.480	349.880	along
349.880	350.000	the
350.000	350.480	crowded
350.480	351.000	paths
351.000	351.160	of
351.160	351.400	life,
351.400	352.320	warning
352.320	352.680	all
352.680	353.040	human
353.040	353.640	sympathy
353.640	353.840	to
353.840	354.200	keep
354.200	354.320	its
354.320	354.760	distance,
354.760	355.240	was
355.240	355.400	what
355.400	355.520	the
355.520	355.920	knowing
355.920	356.240	ones
356.240	356.680	call
356.680	357.360	“nuts”
357.360	357.840	to
357.840	358.640	Scrooge.
358.640	359.960	Once
359.960	360.400	upon
360.400	360.440	a
360.440	360.920	time
360.920	361.280	—
361.280	361.520	of
361.520	361.720	all
361.720	361.920	the
361.920	362.400	good
362.400	362.640	days
362.640	362.880	in
362.880	363.000	the
363.000	363.360	year,
363.360	363.920	on
363.920	364.480	Christmas
364.480	364.920	Eve
364.920	365.040	—
365.040	365.640	old
365.640	366.200	Scrooge
366.200	366.440	sat
366.440	366.840	busy
366.840	366.960	in
366.960	367.160	his
367.160	368.000	counting-house.
368.000	368.760	It
368.760	368.880	was
368.880	369.200	cold,
369.200	370.080	bleak,
370.080	371.000	biting
371.000	371.320	weather:
371.320	372.480	foggy
372.480	372.920	withal:
372.920	373.920	and
373.920	374.000	he
374.000	374.200	could
374.200	374.520	hear
374.520	374.720	the
374.720	375.080	people
375.080	375.320	in
375.320	375.360	the
375.360	375.720	court
375.720	376.400	outside
376.400	376.680	go
376.680	377.240	wheezing
377.240	377.320	up
377.320	377.920	and
377.920	378.360	down,
378.360	379.080	beating
379.080	379.440	their
379.440	379.720	hands
379.720	380.080	upon
380.080	380.240	their
380.240	380.600	breasts,
380.600	381.000	and
381.000	381.640	stamping
381.640	381.840	their
381.840	382.160	feet
382.160	382.520	upon
382.520	382.560	the
382.560	383.000	pavement
383.000	383.440	stones
383.440	383.640	to
383.640	383.880	warm
383.880	384.040	them.
384.040	384.960	The
384.960	385.240	city
385.240	385.720	clocks
385.720	385.840	had
385.840	386.080	only
386.080	386.360	just
386.360	386.760	gone
386.760	387.000	three,
387.000	387.960	but
387.960	388.120	it
388.120	388.200	was
388.200	388.480	quite
388.480	388.880	dark
388.880	389.200	already
389.200	390.240	—
390.240	390.320	it
390.320	390.440	had
390.440	390.520	not
390.520	390.760	been
390.760	391.120	light
391.120	391.600	all
391.600	391.960	day:
391.960	392.640	and
392.640	393.120	candles
393.120	393.280	were
393.280	393.800	flaring
393.800	393.880	in
393.880	394.000	the
394.000	394.560	windows
394.560	394.680	of
394.680	394.840	the
394.840	395.240	neighbouring
395.240	395.640	offices,
395.640	396.400	like
396.400	396.760	ruddy
396.760	397.560	smears
397.560	397.920	upon
397.920	398.040	the
398.040	398.520	palpable
398.520	398.920	brown
398.920	399.160	air.
399.160	400.320	The
400.320	400.600	fog
400.600	400.960	came
400.960	401.360	pouring
401.360	401.600	in
401.600	401.680	at
401.680	401.920	every
401.920	402.560	chink
402.560	403.080	and
403.080	403.480	keyhole,
403.480	403.640	and
403.640	403.680	was
403.680	403.920	so
403.920	404.400	dense
404.400	404.720	without,
404.720	405.360	that
405.360	405.560	although
405.560	405.720	the
405.720	406.040	court
406.040	406.360	was
406.360	406.480	of
406.480	406.640	the
406.640	407.120	narrowest,
407.120	407.760	the
407.760	408.240	houses
408.240	408.840	opposite
408.840	409.200	were
409.200	409.440	mere
409.440	410.200	phantoms.
410.200	411.320	To
411.320	411.320	see
411.320	411.520	the
411.520	411.760	dingy
411.760	412.240	cloud
412.240	412.480	come
412.480	412.840	drooping
412.840	413.080	down,
413.080	414.120	obscuring
414.120	414.520	everything,
414.520	415.160	one
415.160	415.440	might
415.440	415.640	have
415.640	415.960	thought
415.960	416.160	that
416.160	416.600	Nature
416.600	417.040	lived
417.040	417.360	hard
417.360	417.560	by,
417.560	418.360	and
418.360	418.440	was
418.440	418.880	brewing
418.880	418.920	on
418.920	419.000	a
419.000	419.640	large
419.640	420.400	scale.
420.400	421.320	The
421.320	421.560	door
421.560	421.680	of
421.680	422.240	Scrooge’s
422.240	422.960	counting-house
422.960	423.160	was
423.160	423.520	open
423.520	423.960	that
423.960	424.080	he
424.080	424.240	might
424.240	424.480	keep
424.480	424.600	his
424.600	424.880	eye
424.880	425.320	upon
425.320	425.440	his
425.440	425.760	clerk,
425.760	426.040	who
426.040	426.640	in
426.640	426.960	a
426.960	427.480	dismal
427.480	427.880	little
427.880	428.240	cell
428.240	428.560	beyond,
428.560	428.880	a
428.880	429.320	sort
429.320	429.440	of
429.440	429.760	tank,
429.760	430.640	was
430.640	431.040	copying
431.040	431.440	letters.
431.440	433.080	Scrooge
433.080	433.280	had
433.280	433.480	a
433.480	433.520	very
433.520	434.000	small
434.000	434.280	fire,
434.280	435.240	but
435.240	435.400	the
435.400	435.760	clerk’s
435.760	436.120	fire
436.120	436.400	was
436.400	436.640	so
436.640	436.960	very
436.960	437.320	much
437.320	437.800	smaller
437.800	437.880	that
437.880	438.080	it
438.080	438.560	looked
438.560	438.760	like
438.760	439.120	one
439.120	439.600	coal.
439.600	440.280	But
440.280	440.400	he
440.400	440.640	couldn’t
440.640	441.120	replenish
441.120	441.280	it,
441.280	441.640	for
441.640	442.120	Scrooge
442.120	442.480	kept
442.480	442.720	the
442.720	443.280	coal-box
443.280	443.480	in
443.480	443.600	his
443.600	443.840	own
443.840	444.200	room;
444.200	444.960	and
444.960	445.200	so
445.200	445.920	surely
445.920	446.120	as
446.120	446.320	the
446.320	446.600	clerk
446.600	446.840	came
446.840	447.000	in
447.000	447.200	with
447.200	447.200	the
447.200	447.480	shovel,
447.480	447.800	the
447.800	448.360	master
448.360	449.000	predicted
449.000	449.200	that
449.200	449.400	it
449.400	449.680	would
449.680	449.920	be
449.920	450.360	necessary
450.360	450.800	for
450.800	450.960	them
450.960	451.160	to
451.160	451.480	part.
451.480	452.200	Wherefore
452.200	452.280	the
452.280	452.960	clerk
452.960	453.280	put
453.280	453.600	on
453.600	453.800	his
453.800	454.040	white
454.040	454.360	comforter,
454.360	454.680	and
454.680	455.040	tried
455.040	455.160	to
455.160	455.400	warm
455.400	455.920	himself
455.920	456.120	at
456.120	456.360	the
456.360	456.600	candle;
456.600	457.160	in
457.160	457.360	which
457.360	457.520	effort,
457.520	458.200	not
458.200	458.560	being
458.560	458.640	a
458.640	458.760	man
458.760	458.760	of
458.760	458.840	a
458.840	459.400	strong
459.400	459.880	imagination,
459.880	460.880	he
460.880	461.200	failed.
461.200	463.280	“A
463.280	463.480	merry
463.480	464.040	Christmas,
464.040	464.640	uncle!
464.640	464.880	God
464.880	465.280	save
465.280	466.320	you!”
466.320	466.400	cried
466.400	466.560	a
466.560	466.880	cheerful
466.880	467.280	voice.
467.280	468.160	It
468.160	468.280	was
468.280	468.360	the
468.360	468.640	voice
468.640	468.840	of
468.840	469.280	Scrooge’s
469.280	469.480	nephew,
469.480	469.840	who
469.840	470.240	came
470.240	470.480	upon
470.480	470.640	him
470.640	470.960	so
470.960	471.560	quickly
471.560	471.840	that
471.840	472.080	this
472.080	472.320	was
472.320	472.480	the
472.480	472.720	first
472.720	473.480	intimation
473.480	473.680	he
473.680	473.880	had
473.880	474.000	of
474.000	474.160	his
474.160	474.520	approach.
474.520	476.120	“Bah!”
476.120	476.240	said
476.240	476.520	Scrooge,
476.520	477.480	“Humbug!”
477.480	478.320	He
478.320	478.400	had
478.400	478.640	so
478.640	479.120	heated
479.120	479.600	himself
479.600	479.840	with
479.840	480.160	rapid
480.160	480.680	walking
480.680	480.920	in
480.920	481.040	the
481.040	481.280	fog
481.280	481.560	and
481.560	481.800	frost,
481.800	482.400	this
482.400	482.720	nephew
482.720	482.960	of
482.960	483.320	Scrooge’s,
483.320	484.240	that
484.240	484.360	he
484.360	484.480	was
484.480	484.640	all
484.640	485.040	in
485.040	485.160	a
485.160	485.360	glow;
485.360	486.200	his
486.200	486.440	face
486.440	486.760	was
486.760	487.080	ruddy
487.080	487.600	and
487.600	488.000	handsome;
488.000	488.800	his
488.800	489.000	eyes
489.000	489.400	sparkled,
489.400	489.640	and
489.640	490.160	his
490.160	490.480	breath
490.480	491.240	smoked
491.240	491.640	again.
491.640	492.840	“Christmas
492.840	493.240	a
493.240	493.440	humbug,
493.440	494.840	uncle!”
494.840	494.880	said
494.880	495.280	Scrooge’s
495.280	495.600	nephew.
495.600	496.280	“You
496.280	496.600	don’t
496.600	496.880	mean
496.880	497.000	that,
497.000	497.360	I
497.360	497.400	am
497.400	498.760	sure.”
498.760	498.760	“I
498.760	499.160	do,”
499.160	499.720	said
499.720	500.160	Scrooge.
500.160	500.680	“Merry
500.680	501.600	Christmas!
501.600	502.200	What
502.200	502.240	right
502.240	502.520	have
502.520	502.640	you
502.640	502.720	to
502.720	502.800	be
502.800	503.040	merry?
503.040	503.480	What
503.480	504.040	reason
504.040	504.480	have
504.480	504.680	you
504.680	505.080	to
505.080	505.160	be
505.160	505.360	merry?
505.360	506.200	You’re
506.200	506.520	poor
506.520	507.880	enough.”
507.880	507.880	“Come,
507.880	508.520	then,”
508.520	509.320	returned
509.320	509.520	the
509.520	509.680	nephew
509.680	510.040	gaily.
510.040	510.840	“What
510.840	511.080	right
511.080	511.240	have
511.240	511.360	you
511.360	511.640	to
511.640	511.640	be
511.640	511.920	dismal?
511.920	512.280	What
512.280	513.080	reason
513.080	513.360	have
513.360	513.520	you
513.520	513.760	to
513.760	513.840	be
513.840	514.280	morose?
514.280	515.240	You’re
515.240	515.440	rich
515.440	517.200	enough.”
517.200	517.400	Scrooge
517.400	518.200	having
518.200	518.400	no
518.400	518.600	better
518.600	518.920	answer
518.920	519.200	ready
519.200	519.480	on
519.480	519.680	the
519.680	520.040	spur
520.040	520.200	of
520.200	520.320	the
520.320	520.360	moment,
520.360	520.600	said
520.600	521.920	“Bah!”
521.920	522.000	again;
522.000	523.000	and
523.000	523.480	followed
523.480	523.680	it
523.680	523.840	up
523.840	523.960	with
523.960	525.920	“Humbug.”
525.920	525.960	“Don’t
525.960	526.240	be
526.240	526.400	cross,
526.400	527.400	uncle!”
527.400	527.400	said
527.400	527.760	the
527.760	527.960	nephew.
527.960	529.120	“What
529.120	529.240	else
529.240	529.600	can
529.600	529.720	I
529.720	530.040	be,”
530.040	530.640	returned
530.640	530.880	the
530.880	531.160	uncle,
531.160	531.920	“when
531.920	532.040	I
532.040	532.240	live
532.240	532.440	in
532.440	532.560	such
532.560	532.840	a
532.840	533.040	world
533.040	533.280	of
533.280	533.640	fools
533.640	533.800	as
533.800	534.280	this?
534.280	535.000	Merry
535.000	535.960	Christmas!
535.960	536.480	Out
536.480	536.920	upon
536.920	537.320	merry
537.320	538.280	Christmas!
538.280	539.000	What’s
539.000	539.400	Christmas
539.400	539.800	time
539.800	540.120	to
540.120	540.360	you
540.360	540.560	but
540.560	540.720	a
540.720	540.920	time
540.920	541.120	for
541.120	541.400	paying
541.400	541.760	bills
541.760	542.240	without
542.240	542.480	money;
542.480	542.720	a
542.720	543.480	time
543.480	543.800	for
543.800	544.240	finding
544.240	544.720	yourself
544.720	544.960	a
544.960	545.080	year
545.080	545.280	older,
545.280	545.880	but
545.880	546.320	not
546.320	546.600	an
546.600	546.720	hour
546.720	547.160	richer;
547.160	547.640	a
547.640	548.280	time
548.280	548.480	for
548.480	548.880	balancing
548.880	549.200	your
549.200	549.560	books
549.560	549.880	and
549.880	550.480	having
550.480	550.560	every
550.560	550.800	item
550.800	551.160	in
551.160	551.320	’em
551.320	551.480	through
551.480	551.600	a
551.600	551.920	round
551.920	552.360	dozen
552.360	552.680	of
552.680	553.080	months
553.080	553.560	presented
553.560	554.000	dead
554.000	554.240	against
554.240	554.560	you?
554.560	555.360	If
555.360	555.520	I
555.520	555.760	could
555.760	556.040	work
556.040	556.360	my
556.360	556.840	will,”
556.840	557.680	said
557.680	558.160	Scrooge
558.160	558.440	indignantly,
558.440	558.720	“every
558.720	559.000	idiot
559.000	559.640	who
559.640	560.080	goes
560.080	561.160	about
561.160	561.440	with
561.440	561.680	‘Merry
561.680	562.600	Christmas’
562.600	563.000	on
563.000	563.200	his
563.200	563.400	lips,
563.400	563.800	should
563.800	564.240	be
564.240	564.600	boiled
564.600	564.760	with
564.760	564.920	his
564.920	565.080	own
565.080	565.400	pudding,
565.400	565.720	and
565.720	566.400	buried
566.400	566.680	with
566.680	566.840	a
566.840	566.920	stake
566.920	567.400	of
567.400	567.480	holly
567.480	567.800	through
567.800	568.120	his
568.120	568.240	heart.
568.240	568.560	He
568.560	569.240	should!”
569.240	570.280	“Uncle!”
570.280	571.480	“Nephew!”
571.480	572.080	returned
572.080	572.320	the
572.320	572.400	uncle,
572.400	572.640	sternly,
572.640	573.560	“keep
573.560	573.920	Christmas
573.920	574.240	in
574.240	574.360	your
574.360	574.640	own
574.640	574.920	way,
574.920	575.680	and
575.680	575.800	let
575.800	576.000	me
576.000	576.040	keep
576.040	576.320	it
576.320	576.560	in
576.560	577.000	mine.”
577.000	577.840	“Keep
577.840	578.760	it!”
578.760	579.000	repeated
579.000	579.400	Scrooge’s
579.400	579.720	nephew.
579.720	580.640	“But
580.640	580.760	you
580.760	581.080	don’t
581.080	581.400	keep
581.400	582.600	it.”
582.600	582.600	“Let
582.600	582.880	me
582.880	583.160	leave
583.160	583.400	it
583.400	583.560	alone,
583.560	584.240	then,”
584.240	584.520	said
584.520	585.160	Scrooge.
585.160	585.720	“Much
585.720	586.000	good
586.000	586.440	may
586.440	586.640	it
586.640	586.880	do
586.880	587.000	you!
587.000	587.240	Much
587.240	587.680	good
587.680	588.000	it
588.000	588.200	has
588.200	588.600	ever
588.600	588.720	done
588.720	588.920	you!”
588.920	588.960	“There
588.960	590.240	are
590.240	590.320	many
590.320	590.840	things
590.840	591.120	from
591.120	591.280	which
591.280	591.480	I
591.480	591.680	might
591.680	591.960	have
591.960	592.240	derived
592.240	592.600	good,
592.600	593.040	by
593.040	593.440	which
593.440	593.680	I
593.680	593.880	have
593.880	594.080	not
594.080	594.600	profited,
594.600	594.960	I
594.960	595.120	dare
595.120	595.480	say,”
595.480	596.040	returned
596.040	596.400	the
596.400	596.560	nephew.
596.560	597.880	“Christmas
597.880	598.480	among
598.480	598.800	the
598.800	598.880	rest.
598.880	599.680	But
599.680	599.880	I
599.880	600.200	am
600.200	600.360	sure
600.360	600.800	I
600.800	600.960	have
600.960	601.360	always
601.360	601.760	thought
601.760	601.960	of
601.960	602.160	Christmas
602.160	602.560	time,
602.560	603.200	when
603.200	603.440	it
603.440	603.600	has
603.600	603.760	come
603.760	604.040	round
604.040	604.400	—
604.400	604.840	apart
604.840	605.280	from
605.280	605.560	the
605.560	606.080	veneration
606.080	606.400	due
606.400	606.640	to
606.640	606.800	its
606.800	607.040	sacred
607.040	607.400	name
607.400	607.800	and
607.800	608.040	origin,
608.040	608.520	if
608.520	608.960	anything
608.960	609.400	belonging
609.400	609.880	to
609.880	610.040	it
610.040	610.120	can
610.120	610.240	be
610.240	610.360	apart
610.360	610.720	from
610.720	610.880	that
610.880	611.120	—
611.120	611.480	as
611.480	611.640	a
611.640	611.760	good
611.760	612.080	time:
612.080	613.200	a
613.200	613.400	kind,
613.400	613.960	forgiving,
613.960	615.040	charitable,
615.040	615.720	pleasant
615.720	616.160	time:
616.160	617.160	the
617.160	617.360	only
617.360	617.560	time
617.560	617.800	I
617.800	618.040	know
618.040	618.280	of,
618.280	618.480	in
618.480	618.840	the
618.840	619.000	long
619.000	619.640	calendar
619.640	620.160	of
620.160	620.480	the
620.480	620.680	year,
620.680	621.200	when
621.200	621.560	men
621.560	621.920	and
621.920	622.200	women
622.200	622.640	seem
622.640	623.080	by
623.080	623.360	one
623.360	623.960	consent
623.960	624.400	to
624.400	624.440	open
624.440	624.960	their
624.960	625.320	shut-up
625.320	625.680	hearts
625.680	626.000	freely,
626.000	626.960	and
626.960	627.040	to
627.040	627.160	think
627.160	627.520	of
627.520	627.720	people
627.720	628.080	below
628.080	628.480	them
628.480	628.600	as
628.600	628.920	if
628.920	629.080	they
629.080	629.280	really
629.280	629.360	were
629.360	630.120	fellow-passengers
630.120	630.560	to
630.560	630.720	the
630.720	630.920	grave,
630.920	631.440	and
631.440	631.960	not
631.960	632.240	another
632.240	632.560	race
632.560	633.000	of
633.000	633.240	creatures
633.240	633.800	bound
633.800	634.040	on
634.040	634.200	other
634.200	634.560	journeys.
634.560	635.800	And
635.800	636.000	therefore,
636.000	636.440	uncle,
636.440	637.560	though
637.560	637.800	it
637.800	637.960	has
637.960	638.120	never
638.120	638.480	put
638.480	638.600	a
638.600	638.680	scrap
638.680	639.080	of
639.080	639.400	gold
639.400	640.000	or
640.000	640.120	silver
640.120	640.800	in
640.800	640.920	my
640.920	641.240	pocket,
641.240	641.880	I
641.880	642.080	believe
642.080	642.640	that
642.640	642.880	it
642.880	643.080	has
643.080	643.440	done
643.440	643.640	me
643.640	643.720	good,
643.720	644.040	and
644.040	644.760	will
644.760	645.160	do
645.160	645.360	me
645.360	645.520	good;
645.520	646.120	and
646.120	646.520	I
646.520	646.840	say,
646.840	647.280	God
647.280	648.320	bless
648.320	648.640	it!”
648.640	648.840	The
648.840	650.000	clerk
650.000	650.360	in
650.360	650.400	the
650.400	650.560	tank
650.560	651.240	involuntarily
651.240	651.880	applauded:
651.880	652.680	becoming
652.680	653.560	immediately
653.560	654.200	sensible
654.200	654.600	of
654.600	654.680	the
654.680	654.920	impropriety,
654.920	655.320	he
655.320	655.920	poked
655.920	656.280	the
656.280	656.360	fire,
656.360	656.720	and
656.720	657.560	extinguished
657.560	658.120	the
658.120	658.320	last
658.320	658.720	frail
658.720	659.080	spark
659.080	659.680	for
659.680	659.880	ever.
659.880	661.120	“Let
661.120	661.440	me
661.440	661.720	hear
661.720	662.080	another
662.080	662.480	sound
662.480	663.040	from
663.040	663.280	you,”
663.280	664.040	said
664.040	664.360	Scrooge,
664.360	665.120	“and
665.120	665.360	you’ll
665.360	665.800	keep
665.800	666.120	your
666.120	666.520	Christmas
666.520	666.920	by
666.920	667.160	losing
667.160	667.480	your
667.480	667.960	situation.
667.960	669.680	You’re
669.680	670.160	quite
670.160	670.400	a
670.400	670.600	powerful
670.600	671.080	speaker,
671.080	671.680	sir,”
671.680	672.560	he
672.560	672.720	added,
672.720	673.200	turning
673.200	673.520	to
673.520	673.680	his
673.680	673.840	nephew.
673.840	674.800	“I
674.800	674.880	wonder
674.880	675.280	you
675.280	675.560	don’t
675.560	675.640	go
675.640	676.000	into
676.000	676.680	Parliament.”
676.680	677.720	“Don’t
677.720	678.000	be
678.000	678.320	angry,
678.320	678.920	uncle.
678.920	679.920	Come!
679.920	680.320	Dine
680.320	680.840	with
680.840	681.000	us
681.000	681.600	tomorrow.”
681.600	681.760	Scrooge
681.760	683.320	said
683.320	683.520	that
683.520	683.680	he
683.680	683.800	would
683.800	684.160	see
684.160	684.440	him
684.440	684.480	—
684.480	684.680	yes,
684.680	685.280	indeed
685.280	685.520	he
685.520	685.560	did.
685.560	685.640	He
685.640	685.760	went
685.760	686.680	the
686.680	686.920	whole
686.920	687.640	length
687.640	688.000	of
688.000	688.120	the
688.120	688.280	expression,
688.280	689.080	and
689.080	689.400	said
689.400	689.800	that
689.800	689.960	he
689.960	690.120	would
690.120	690.320	see
690.320	690.560	him
690.560	690.840	in
690.840	691.080	that
691.080	691.480	extremity
691.480	692.160	first.
692.160	693.560	“But
693.560	693.920	why?”
693.920	694.600	cried
694.600	695.280	Scrooge’s
695.280	695.680	nephew.
695.680	696.280	“Why?”
696.280	697.600	“Why
697.600	697.760	did
697.760	697.960	you
697.960	698.400	get
698.400	698.600	married?”
698.600	699.240	said
699.240	699.480	Scrooge.
699.480	700.560	“Because
700.560	700.920	I
700.920	701.120	fell
701.120	701.320	in
701.320	701.640	love.”
701.640	701.960	“Because
701.960	703.200	you
703.200	703.400	fell
703.400	703.880	in
703.880	704.400	love!”
704.400	704.800	growled
704.800	705.960	Scrooge,
705.960	706.640	as
706.640	707.120	if
707.120	707.320	that
707.320	707.600	were
707.600	707.720	the
707.720	707.960	only
707.960	708.560	one
708.560	709.200	thing
709.200	709.720	in
709.720	709.920	the
709.920	710.160	world
710.160	710.760	more
710.760	711.320	ridiculous
711.320	711.840	than
711.840	712.240	a
712.240	712.280	merry
712.280	712.600	Christmas.
712.600	713.480	“Good
713.480	714.120	afternoon!”
714.120	714.440	“Nay,
714.440	715.360	uncle,
715.360	715.800	but
715.800	716.560	you
716.560	716.800	never
716.800	717.080	came
717.080	717.280	to
717.280	717.360	see
717.360	717.560	me
717.560	717.720	before
717.720	718.160	that
718.160	718.440	happened.
718.440	719.160	Why
719.160	719.400	give
719.400	719.600	it
719.600	719.720	as
719.720	719.800	a
719.800	719.880	reason
719.880	720.520	for
720.520	720.680	not
720.680	720.960	coming
720.960	721.440	now?”
721.440	721.760	“Good
721.760	723.040	afternoon,”
723.040	723.560	said
723.560	723.880	Scrooge.
723.880	724.040	“I
724.040	724.880	want
724.880	725.200	nothing
725.200	725.560	from
725.560	725.880	you;
725.880	726.080	I
726.080	726.600	ask
726.600	726.920	nothing
726.920	727.400	of
727.400	727.560	you;
727.560	727.840	why
727.840	728.440	cannot
728.440	728.800	we
728.800	729.000	be
729.000	729.440	friends?”
729.440	729.720	“Good
729.720	731.080	afternoon,”
731.080	731.960	said
731.960	733.080	Scrooge.
733.080	733.560	“I
733.560	733.680	am
733.680	733.880	sorry,
733.880	734.240	with
734.240	734.480	all
734.480	734.720	my
734.720	734.960	heart,
734.960	735.400	to
735.400	735.560	find
735.560	735.880	you
735.880	736.000	so
736.000	736.280	resolute.
736.280	737.520	We
737.520	737.640	have
737.640	737.920	never
737.920	738.280	had
738.280	738.520	any
738.520	738.760	quarrel,
738.760	739.200	to
739.200	739.360	which
739.360	739.520	I
739.520	739.640	have
739.640	739.800	been
739.800	739.920	a
739.920	740.240	party.
740.240	740.600	But
740.600	741.360	I
741.360	741.520	have
741.520	741.720	made
741.720	742.120	the
742.120	742.320	trial
742.320	742.800	in
742.800	743.000	homage
743.000	743.640	to
743.640	743.800	Christmas,
743.800	744.200	and
744.200	744.920	I’ll
744.920	745.120	keep
745.120	745.480	my
745.480	745.720	Christmas
745.720	746.160	humour
746.160	746.520	to
746.520	746.640	the
746.640	746.760	last.
746.760	747.320	So
747.320	748.080	A
748.080	748.320	Merry
748.320	748.680	Christmas,
748.680	749.400	uncle!”
749.400	749.720	“Good
749.720	750.600	afternoon,”
750.600	751.920	said
751.920	752.200	Scrooge.
752.200	752.880	“And
752.880	753.120	A
753.120	753.440	Happy
753.440	753.880	New
753.880	754.320	Year!”
754.320	754.920	“Good
754.920	755.960	afternoon!”
755.960	757.160	said
757.160	757.480	Scrooge.
757.480	758.120	His
758.120	759.560	nephew
759.560	759.920	left
759.920	760.040	the
760.040	760.200	room
760.200	760.600	without
760.600	760.880	an
760.880	761.000	angry
761.000	761.280	word,
761.280	762.040	notwithstanding.
762.040	762.920	He
762.920	763.040	stopped
763.040	763.240	at
763.240	763.480	the
763.480	763.640	outer
763.640	763.920	door
763.920	764.160	to
764.160	764.280	bestow
764.280	764.600	the
764.600	764.880	greetings
764.880	765.240	of
765.240	765.240	the
765.240	765.320	season
765.320	765.840	on
765.840	765.960	the
765.960	766.160	clerk,
766.160	766.480	who
766.480	766.800	cold
766.800	767.040	as
767.040	767.640	he
767.640	767.720	was,
767.720	768.120	was
768.120	768.800	warmer
768.800	769.080	than
769.080	769.240	Scrooge;
769.240	769.920	for
769.920	770.520	he
770.520	770.760	returned
770.760	771.240	them
771.240	771.480	cordially.
771.480	773.120	“There’s
773.120	773.520	another
773.520	774.000	fellow,”
774.000	774.600	muttered
774.600	775.200	Scrooge;
775.200	775.800	who
775.800	776.120	overheard
776.120	776.640	him:
776.640	776.800	“my
776.800	777.760	clerk,
777.760	778.320	with
778.320	778.880	fifteen
778.880	779.440	shillings
779.440	779.960	a
779.960	780.120	week,
780.120	780.520	and
780.520	780.920	a
780.920	781.160	wife
781.160	781.600	and
781.600	781.800	family,
781.800	782.640	talking
782.640	783.000	about
783.000	783.280	a
783.280	783.480	merry
783.480	784.080	Christmas.
784.080	785.880	I’ll
785.880	786.040	retire
786.040	786.600	to
786.600	787.000	Bedlam.”
787.000	788.640	This
788.640	788.960	lunatic,
788.960	789.400	in
789.400	790.120	letting
790.120	790.400	Scrooge’s
790.400	790.880	nephew
790.880	791.080	out,
791.080	791.560	had
791.560	792.240	let
792.240	792.640	two
792.640	792.960	other
792.960	793.320	people
793.320	793.560	in.
793.560	793.920	They
793.920	795.080	were
795.080	795.400	portly
795.400	795.720	gentlemen,
795.720	796.520	pleasant
796.520	796.840	to
796.840	796.960	behold,
796.960	797.400	and
797.400	797.680	now
797.680	797.880	stood,
797.880	798.240	with
798.240	798.720	their
798.720	798.880	hats
798.880	799.040	off,
799.040	799.360	in
799.360	799.920	Scrooge’s
799.920	800.400	office.
800.400	800.880	They
800.880	801.840	had
801.840	802.080	books
802.080	802.360	and
802.360	802.600	papers
802.600	802.920	in
802.920	803.080	their
803.080	803.480	hands,
803.480	803.680	and
803.680	804.200	bowed
804.200	804.640	to
804.640	804.760	him.
804.760	806.240	“Scrooge
806.240	806.760	and
806.760	806.920	Marley’s,
806.920	807.240	I
807.240	807.720	believe,”
807.720	808.240	said
808.240	809.080	one
809.080	809.160	of
809.160	809.320	the
809.320	809.480	gentlemen,
809.480	809.920	referring
809.920	810.480	to
810.480	810.640	his
810.640	810.800	list.
810.800	811.120	“Have
811.120	812.160	I
812.160	812.320	the
812.320	812.560	pleasure
812.560	812.760	of
812.760	813.040	addressing
813.040	813.320	Mr.
813.320	813.840	Scrooge,
813.840	814.760	or
814.760	815.200	Mr.
815.200	815.840	Marley?”
815.840	816.520	“Mr.
816.520	817.480	Marley
817.480	818.520	has
818.520	818.880	been
818.880	819.120	dead
819.120	819.600	these
819.600	819.800	seven
819.800	820.160	years,”
820.160	820.680	Scrooge
820.680	821.360	replied.
821.360	822.480	“He
822.480	822.600	died
822.600	823.040	seven
823.040	823.360	years
823.360	823.480	ago,
823.480	823.720	this
823.720	824.200	very
824.200	824.640	night.”
824.640	826.280	“We
826.280	826.400	have
826.400	826.600	no
826.600	826.800	doubt
826.800	827.360	his
827.360	827.680	liberality
827.680	828.320	is
828.320	828.600	well
828.600	829.080	represented
829.080	829.800	by
829.800	829.960	his
829.960	830.240	surviving
830.240	830.920	partner,”
830.920	831.800	said
831.800	831.920	the
831.920	832.160	gentleman,
832.160	832.760	presenting
832.760	833.200	his
833.200	833.480	credentials.
833.480	833.840	It
833.840	835.040	certainly
835.040	835.400	was;
835.400	835.800	for
835.800	836.320	they
836.320	836.520	had
836.520	836.680	been
836.680	837.040	two
837.040	837.400	kindred
837.400	837.760	spirits.
837.760	838.160	At
838.160	839.000	the
839.000	839.240	ominous
839.240	839.600	word
839.600	840.600	“liberality,”
840.600	841.640	Scrooge
841.640	842.040	frowned,
842.040	842.360	and
842.360	842.680	shook
842.680	842.960	his
842.960	843.160	head,
843.160	843.480	and
843.480	844.280	handed
844.280	844.600	the
844.600	844.880	credentials
844.880	845.360	back.
845.360	845.640	“At
845.640	847.360	this
847.360	847.600	festive
847.600	848.160	season
848.160	848.640	of
848.640	848.760	the
848.760	848.880	year,
848.880	849.000	Mr.
849.000	849.640	Scrooge,”
849.640	850.440	said
850.440	850.600	the
850.600	851.120	gentleman,
851.120	851.600	taking
851.600	852.000	up
852.000	852.120	a
852.120	852.160	pen,
852.160	852.400	“it
852.400	853.280	is
853.280	853.520	more
853.520	853.880	than
853.880	854.080	usually
854.080	854.640	desirable
854.640	855.360	that
855.360	855.680	we
855.680	855.800	should
855.800	856.080	make
856.080	856.360	some
856.360	856.920	slight
856.920	857.560	provision
857.560	858.320	for
858.320	858.560	the
858.560	858.840	Poor
858.840	859.120	and
859.120	859.640	Destitute,
859.640	860.120	who
860.120	860.640	suffer
860.640	861.160	greatly
861.160	861.600	at
861.600	862.040	the
862.040	862.440	present
862.440	862.800	time.
862.800	863.200	Many
863.200	864.560	thousands
864.560	865.480	are
865.480	865.560	in
865.560	865.880	want
865.880	866.240	of
866.240	866.480	common
866.480	866.920	necessaries;
866.920	868.040	hundreds
868.040	868.720	of
868.720	869.000	thousands
869.000	869.640	are
869.640	869.840	in
869.840	870.120	want
870.120	870.440	of
870.440	870.840	common
870.840	871.200	comforts,
871.200	871.880	sir.”
871.880	872.280	“Are
872.280	872.840	there
872.840	873.040	no
873.040	873.440	prisons?”
873.440	874.480	asked
874.480	874.960	Scrooge.
874.960	875.480	“Plenty
875.480	876.400	of
876.400	876.720	prisons,”
876.720	877.440	said
877.440	877.840	the
877.840	878.160	gentleman,
878.160	878.360	laying
878.360	878.920	down
878.920	879.200	the
879.200	879.360	pen
879.360	879.600	again.
879.600	879.920	“And
879.920	880.760	the
880.760	881.000	Union
881.000	881.680	workhouses?”
881.680	882.520	demanded
882.520	882.840	Scrooge.
882.840	883.360	“Are
883.360	883.880	they
883.880	884.040	still
884.040	884.280	in
884.280	884.760	operation?”
884.760	886.040	“They
886.040	886.160	are.
886.160	886.720	Still,”
886.720	887.320	returned
887.320	888.080	the
888.080	888.520	gentleman,
888.520	889.040	“I
889.040	889.600	wish
889.600	889.800	I
889.800	890.040	could
890.040	890.280	say
890.280	890.600	they
890.600	890.720	were
890.720	891.000	not.”
891.000	891.400	“The
891.400	892.400	Treadmill
892.400	892.800	and
892.800	893.120	the
893.120	893.360	Poor
893.360	893.760	Law
893.760	894.000	are
894.000	894.280	in
894.280	894.600	full
894.600	894.920	vigour,
894.920	895.440	then?”
895.440	896.520	said
896.520	896.840	Scrooge.
896.840	897.480	“Both
897.480	898.320	very
898.320	898.720	busy,
898.720	899.000	sir.”
899.000	899.160	“Oh!
899.160	899.160	I
899.160	900.320	was
900.320	901.440	afraid,
901.440	901.880	from
901.880	902.240	what
902.240	902.400	you
902.400	902.640	said
902.640	902.840	at
902.840	903.200	first,
903.200	903.560	that
903.560	903.960	something
903.960	904.240	had
904.240	904.480	occurred
904.480	904.800	to
904.800	904.960	stop
904.960	905.320	them
905.320	905.520	in
905.520	905.720	their
905.720	906.000	useful
906.000	906.560	course,”
906.560	907.680	said
907.680	907.920	Scrooge.
907.920	908.920	“I’m
908.920	909.080	very
909.080	909.360	glad
909.360	909.720	to
909.720	910.160	hear
910.160	910.440	it.”
910.440	912.120	“Under
912.120	912.240	the
912.240	912.600	impression
912.600	913.080	that
913.080	913.320	they
913.320	913.760	scarcely
913.760	914.480	furnish
914.480	914.920	Christian
914.920	915.320	cheer
915.320	915.640	of
915.640	916.040	mind
916.040	916.360	or
916.360	916.800	body
916.800	916.960	to
916.960	917.240	the
917.240	917.480	multitude,”
917.480	918.120	returned
918.120	918.640	the
918.640	919.040	gentleman,
919.040	919.360	“a
919.360	919.920	few
919.920	920.080	of
920.080	920.240	us
920.240	920.320	are
920.320	920.720	endeavouring
920.720	921.200	to
921.200	921.480	raise
921.480	921.680	a
921.680	922.040	fund
922.040	922.360	to
922.360	922.800	buy
922.800	922.960	the
922.960	923.200	Poor
923.200	923.520	some
923.520	923.880	meat
923.880	924.160	and
924.160	924.640	drink
924.640	925.000	and
925.000	925.400	means
925.400	925.640	of
925.640	926.000	warmth.
926.000	926.320	We
926.320	927.080	choose
927.080	927.400	this
927.400	927.600	time,
927.600	928.040	because
928.040	928.560	it
928.560	928.800	is
928.800	928.880	a
928.880	929.000	time,
929.000	929.240	of
929.240	930.040	all
930.040	930.240	others,
930.240	930.560	when
930.560	931.640	Want
931.640	932.040	is
932.040	932.360	keenly
932.360	932.560	felt,
932.560	933.000	and
933.000	933.680	Abundance
933.680	934.600	rejoices.
934.600	935.200	What
935.200	936.560	shall
936.560	936.800	I
936.800	936.880	put
936.880	937.120	you
937.120	937.320	down
937.320	937.800	for?”
937.800	938.920	“Nothing!”
938.920	939.440	Scrooge
939.440	940.000	replied.
940.000	940.480	“You
940.480	941.400	wish
941.400	941.560	to
941.560	941.760	be
941.760	941.960	anonymous?”
941.960	943.400	“I
943.400	943.400	wish
943.400	943.720	to
943.720	944.240	be
944.240	944.360	left
944.360	944.760	alone,”
944.760	945.160	said
945.160	945.960	Scrooge.
945.960	946.920	“Since
946.920	947.040	you
947.040	947.240	ask
947.240	947.400	me
947.400	947.720	what
947.720	947.920	I
947.920	948.040	wish,
948.040	948.520	gentlemen,
948.520	949.160	that
949.160	950.040	is
950.040	950.480	my
950.480	950.720	answer.
950.720	950.840	I
950.840	951.880	don’t
951.880	952.200	make
952.200	952.360	merry
952.360	952.920	myself
952.920	953.040	at
953.040	953.360	Christmas
953.360	953.600	and
953.600	953.840	I
953.840	954.080	can’t
954.080	954.480	afford
954.480	954.760	to
954.760	954.960	make
954.960	955.080	idle
955.080	955.520	people
955.520	955.800	merry.
955.800	956.000	I
956.000	957.120	help
957.120	957.480	to
957.480	957.760	support
957.760	958.080	the
958.080	958.480	establishments
958.480	959.160	I
959.160	959.480	have
959.480	959.880	mentioned
959.880	959.880	—
959.880	960.360	they
960.360	960.800	cost
960.800	961.000	enough;
961.000	961.400	and
961.400	962.320	those
962.320	962.600	who
962.600	962.920	are
962.920	963.040	badly
963.040	963.280	off
963.280	963.760	must
963.760	964.280	go
964.280	964.760	there.”
964.760	966.200	“Many
966.200	966.320	can’t
966.320	966.680	go
966.680	966.880	there;
966.880	967.160	and
967.160	967.400	many
967.400	968.000	would
968.000	968.240	rather
968.240	968.680	die.”
968.680	969.120	“If
969.120	969.120	they
969.120	970.240	would
970.240	970.440	rather
970.440	970.880	die,”
970.880	971.400	said
971.400	971.960	Scrooge,
971.960	972.360	“they
972.360	972.880	had
972.880	973.240	better
973.240	973.400	do
973.400	973.600	it,
973.600	974.000	and
974.000	974.720	decrease
974.720	974.880	the
974.880	975.320	surplus
975.320	975.960	population.
975.960	976.800	Besides
976.800	977.520	—
977.520	978.200	excuse
978.200	978.800	me
978.800	979.000	—
979.000	979.160	I
979.160	979.720	don’t
979.720	979.960	know
979.960	980.320	that.”
980.320	981.680	“But
981.680	981.680	you
981.680	981.880	might
981.880	982.200	know
982.200	982.680	it,”
982.680	982.880	observed
982.880	983.240	the
983.240	983.520	gentleman.
983.520	983.920	“It’s
983.920	984.720	not
984.720	985.160	my
985.160	985.640	business,”
985.640	986.360	Scrooge
986.360	986.880	returned.
986.880	987.440	“It’s
987.440	988.280	enough
988.280	988.640	for
988.640	988.800	a
988.800	989.160	man
989.160	989.240	to
989.240	989.480	understand
989.480	989.880	his
989.880	990.040	own
990.040	990.200	business,
990.200	990.560	and
990.560	991.280	not
991.280	991.520	to
991.520	991.800	interfere
991.800	992.080	with
992.080	992.200	other
992.200	992.520	people’s.
992.520	992.960	Mine
992.960	994.160	occupies
994.160	994.600	me
994.600	995.120	constantly.
995.120	995.600	Good
995.600	996.360	afternoon,
996.360	997.200	gentlemen!”
997.200	998.640	Seeing
998.640	998.880	clearly
998.880	999.200	that
999.200	999.520	it
999.520	999.680	would
999.680	999.840	be
999.840	1000.080	useless
1000.080	1000.280	to
1000.280	1000.760	pursue
1000.760	1000.920	their
1000.920	1001.040	point,
1001.040	1001.280	the
1001.280	1002.040	gentlemen
1002.040	1002.280	withdrew.
1002.280	1002.800	Scrooge
1002.800	1004.160	returned
1004.160	1004.440	his
1004.440	1004.720	labours
1004.720	1004.960	with
1004.960	1005.360	an
1005.360	1005.600	improved
1005.600	1006.120	opinion
1006.120	1006.320	of
1006.320	1006.600	himself,
1006.600	1006.800	and
1006.800	1007.880	in
1007.880	1008.240	a
1008.240	1008.280	more
1008.280	1008.680	facetious
1008.680	1009.200	temper
1009.200	1009.520	than
1009.520	1009.880	was
1009.880	1010.200	usual
1010.200	1010.440	with
1010.440	1010.760	him.
1010.760	1012.280	Meanwhile
1012.280	1012.360	the
1012.360	1012.800	fog
1012.800	1013.080	and
1013.080	1013.560	darkness
1013.560	1014.080	thickened
1014.080	1014.320	so,
1014.320	1014.640	that
1014.640	1015.200	people
1015.200	1015.400	ran
1015.400	1015.800	about
1015.800	1016.200	with
1016.200	1016.520	flaring
1016.520	1016.840	links,
1016.840	1017.440	proffering
1017.440	1018.320	their
1018.320	1018.760	services
1018.760	1019.080	to
1019.080	1019.360	go
1019.360	1019.600	before
1019.600	1020.080	horses
1020.080	1020.280	in
1020.280	1020.880	carriages,
1020.880	1021.160	and
1021.160	1022.000	conduct
1022.000	1022.200	them
1022.200	1022.400	on
1022.400	1022.600	their
1022.600	1022.800	way.
1022.800	1022.920	The
1022.920	1024.000	ancient
1024.000	1024.560	tower
1024.560	1024.720	of
1024.720	1025.120	a
1025.120	1025.240	church,
1025.240	1025.480	whose
1025.480	1025.880	gruff
1025.880	1026.320	old
1026.320	1026.520	bell
1026.520	1026.920	was
1026.920	1027.360	always
1027.360	1027.840	peeping
1027.840	1028.240	slyly
1028.240	1028.640	down
1028.640	1028.920	at
1028.920	1029.280	Scrooge
1029.280	1029.600	out
1029.600	1030.000	of
1030.000	1030.200	a
1030.200	1030.640	Gothic
1030.640	1030.760	window
1030.760	1030.880	in
1030.880	1031.160	the
1031.160	1031.320	wall,
1031.320	1031.600	became
1031.600	1032.640	invisible,
1032.640	1032.840	and
1032.840	1033.640	struck
1033.640	1033.960	the
1033.960	1034.360	hours
1034.360	1034.640	and
1034.640	1034.960	quarters
1034.960	1035.280	in
1035.280	1035.760	the
1035.760	1035.920	clouds,
1035.920	1036.080	with
1036.080	1036.840	tremulous
1036.840	1037.600	vibrations
1037.600	1038.400	afterwards
1038.400	1038.680	as
1038.680	1039.240	if
1039.240	1039.480	its
1039.480	1039.600	teeth
1039.600	1039.920	were
1039.920	1040.400	chattering
1040.400	1040.720	in
1040.720	1041.120	its
1041.120	1041.320	frozen
1041.320	1041.640	head
1041.640	1042.040	up
1042.040	1042.400	there.
1042.400	1042.560	The
1042.560	1043.800	cold
1043.800	1044.160	became
1044.160	1044.960	intense.
1044.960	1045.240	In
1045.240	1046.600	the
1046.600	1046.720	main
1046.720	1046.960	street
1046.960	1047.160	at
1047.160	1047.720	the
1047.720	1048.000	corner
1048.000	1048.160	of
1048.160	1048.480	the
1048.480	1048.600	court,
1048.600	1048.760	some
1048.760	1049.480	labourers
1049.480	1049.680	were
1049.680	1050.320	repairing
1050.320	1050.520	the
1050.520	1051.040	gas-pipes,
1051.040	1051.240	and
1051.240	1052.160	had
1052.160	1052.480	lighted
1052.480	1052.520	a
1052.520	1052.680	great
1052.680	1053.040	fire
1053.040	1053.240	in
1053.240	1053.520	a
1053.520	1053.680	brazier,
1053.680	1054.000	round
1054.000	1054.880	which
1054.880	1055.240	a
1055.240	1055.600	party
1055.600	1055.840	of
1055.840	1056.200	ragged
1056.200	1056.400	men
1056.400	1056.680	and
1056.680	1057.000	boys
1057.000	1057.240	were
1057.240	1057.560	gathered:
1057.560	1058.080	warming
1058.080	1058.720	their
1058.720	1059.160	hands
1059.160	1059.480	and
1059.480	1059.960	winking
1059.960	1060.120	their
1060.120	1060.360	eyes
1060.360	1060.720	before
1060.720	1060.920	the
1060.920	1061.200	blaze
1061.200	1061.520	in
1061.520	1061.880	rapture.
1061.880	1062.240	The
1062.240	1063.880	water-plug
1063.880	1064.280	being
1064.280	1064.640	left
1064.640	1064.960	in
1064.960	1065.280	solitude,
1065.280	1065.680	its
1065.680	1066.640	overflowing
1066.640	1067.360	sullenly
1067.360	1068.080	congealed,
1068.080	1068.520	and
1068.520	1069.160	turned
1069.160	1069.600	to
1069.600	1070.120	misanthropic
1070.120	1070.840	ice.
1070.840	1071.160	The
1071.160	1072.120	brightness
1072.120	1072.320	of
1072.320	1072.720	the
1072.720	1072.880	shops
1072.880	1073.120	where
1073.120	1073.480	holly
1073.480	1073.800	sprigs
1073.800	1074.240	and
1074.240	1074.640	berries
1074.640	1075.080	crackled
1075.080	1075.400	in
1075.400	1075.880	the
1075.880	1076.160	lamp
1076.160	1076.280	heat
1076.280	1076.520	of
1076.520	1076.920	the
1076.920	1077.080	windows,
1077.080	1077.240	made
1077.240	1077.960	pale
1077.960	1078.400	faces
1078.400	1078.760	ruddy
1078.760	1079.200	as
1079.200	1079.600	they
1079.600	1079.840	passed.
1079.840	1081.120	Poulterers’
1081.120	1081.520	and
1081.520	1082.360	grocers’
1082.360	1082.960	trades
1082.960	1083.360	became
1083.360	1083.600	a
1083.600	1083.840	splendid
1083.840	1084.280	joke;
1084.280	1084.840	a
1084.840	1085.920	glorious
1085.920	1086.320	pageant,
1086.320	1086.720	with
1086.720	1087.080	which
1087.080	1087.480	it
1087.480	1087.600	was
1087.600	1088.000	next
1088.000	1088.280	to
1088.280	1088.920	impossible
1088.920	1089.200	to
1089.200	1089.480	believe
1089.480	1089.800	that
1089.800	1090.040	such
1090.040	1090.240	dull
1090.240	1090.920	principles
1090.920	1091.120	as
1091.120	1091.600	bargain
1091.600	1091.920	and
1091.920	1092.280	sale
1092.280	1092.480	had
1092.480	1093.240	anything
1093.240	1093.440	to
1093.440	1093.840	do.
1093.840	1094.040	The
1094.040	1094.240	Lord
1094.240	1095.280	Mayor,
1095.280	1095.680	in
1095.680	1096.000	the
1096.000	1096.560	stronghold
1096.560	1097.040	of
1097.040	1097.520	the
1097.520	1097.680	mighty
1097.680	1098.040	Mansion
1098.040	1098.320	House,
1098.320	1098.760	gave
1098.760	1099.440	orders
1099.440	1099.680	to
1099.680	1100.160	his
1100.160	1100.320	fifty
1100.320	1100.600	cooks
1100.600	1100.880	and
1100.880	1101.400	butlers
1101.400	1101.600	to
1101.600	1102.040	keep
1102.040	1102.320	Christmas
1102.320	1102.600	as
1102.600	1103.040	a
1103.040	1103.200	Lord
1103.200	1103.440	Mayor’s
1103.440	1104.000	household
1104.000	1104.240	should;
1104.240	1104.320	and
1104.320	1104.560	even
1104.560	1105.520	the
1105.520	1106.120	little
1106.120	1106.240	tailor,
1106.240	1106.480	whom
1106.480	1106.880	he
1106.880	1107.240	had
1107.240	1107.320	fined
1107.320	1107.520	five
1107.520	1108.080	shillings
1108.080	1108.280	on
1108.280	1108.760	the
1108.760	1108.960	previous
1108.960	1109.320	Monday
1109.320	1109.560	for
1109.560	1109.920	being
1109.920	1110.240	drunk
1110.240	1110.280	and
1110.280	1110.960	bloodthirsty
1110.960	1111.240	in
1111.240	1111.560	the
1111.560	1111.840	streets,
1111.840	1112.480	stirred
1112.480	1112.720	up
1112.720	1113.280	to-morrow’s
1113.280	1113.760	pudding
1113.760	1114.160	in
1114.160	1114.360	his
1114.360	1114.480	garret,
1114.480	1114.840	while
1114.840	1115.600	his
1115.600	1115.800	lean
1115.800	1116.080	wife
1116.080	1116.400	and
1116.400	1116.840	the
1116.840	1116.920	baby
1116.920	1117.120	sallied
1117.120	1117.360	out
1117.360	1117.840	to
1117.840	1118.120	buy
1118.120	1118.200	the
1118.200	1118.440	beef.
1118.440	1118.640	Foggier
1118.640	1119.760	yet,
1119.760	1120.280	and
1120.280	1120.920	colder!
1120.920	1121.280	Piercing,
1121.280	1121.840	searching,
1121.840	1123.280	biting
1123.280	1124.000	cold.
1124.000	1124.160	If
1124.160	1125.360	the
1125.360	1125.480	good
1125.480	1125.720	Saint
1125.720	1126.040	Dunstan
1126.040	1126.320	had
1126.320	1126.680	but
1126.680	1127.120	nipped
1127.120	1127.440	the
1127.440	1127.680	Evil
1127.680	1128.160	Spirit’s
1128.160	1128.480	nose
1128.480	1128.760	with
1128.760	1129.200	a
1129.200	1129.360	touch
1129.360	1129.520	of
1129.520	1129.840	such
1129.840	1129.920	weather
1129.920	1130.240	as
1130.240	1130.480	that,
1130.480	1130.640	instead
1130.640	1131.200	of
1131.200	1131.640	using
1131.640	1131.760	his
1131.760	1132.080	familiar
1132.080	1132.320	weapons,
1132.320	1132.720	then
1132.720	1133.400	indeed
1133.400	1133.720	he
1133.720	1134.240	would
1134.240	1134.400	have
1134.400	1134.720	roared
1134.720	1134.920	to
1134.920	1135.440	lusty
1135.440	1135.800	purpose.
1135.800	1136.080	The
1136.080	1136.600	owner
1136.600	1137.720	of
1137.720	1138.040	one
1138.040	1138.200	scant
1138.200	1138.680	young
1138.680	1138.960	nose,
1138.960	1139.240	gnawed
1139.240	1139.800	and
1139.800	1140.400	mumbled
1140.400	1140.840	by
1140.840	1141.360	the
1141.360	1141.480	hungry
1141.480	1141.800	cold
1141.800	1142.120	as
1142.120	1142.760	bones
1142.760	1143.160	are
1143.160	1143.600	gnawed
1143.600	1143.720	by
1143.720	1144.160	dogs,
1144.160	1144.400	stooped
1144.400	1145.360	down
1145.360	1145.760	at
1145.760	1146.120	Scrooge’s
1146.120	1146.560	keyhole
1146.560	1146.880	to
1146.880	1147.440	regale
1147.440	1147.560	him
1147.560	1148.040	with
1148.040	1148.240	a
1148.240	1148.360	Christmas
1148.360	1148.560	carol:
1148.560	1148.960	but
1148.960	1149.240	at
1149.240	1150.000	the
1150.000	1150.120	first
1150.120	1150.280	sound
1150.280	1150.640	of
1150.640	1150.840	—
1150.840	1151.200	“God
1151.200	1151.280	bless
1151.280	1151.920	you,
1151.920	1152.120	merry
1152.120	1152.680	gentleman!
1152.680	1153.280	May
1153.280	1153.840	nothing
1153.840	1154.200	you
1154.200	1155.120	dismay!”
1155.120	1156.040	Scrooge
1156.040	1156.680	seized
1156.680	1156.960	the
1156.960	1157.400	ruler
1157.400	1157.480	with
1157.480	1157.840	such
1157.840	1157.960	energy
1157.960	1158.320	of
1158.320	1158.680	action,
1158.680	1158.760	that
1158.760	1159.160	the
1159.160	1159.280	singer
1159.280	1159.360	fled
1159.360	1159.760	in
1159.760	1160.120	terror,
1160.120	1160.360	leaving
1160.360	1161.160	the
1161.160	1161.440	keyhole
1161.440	1161.600	to
1161.600	1162.160	the
1162.160	1162.280	fog
1162.280	1162.400	and
1162.400	1162.760	even
1162.760	1163.040	more
1163.040	1163.760	congenial
1163.760	1164.240	frost.
1164.240	1164.560	At
1164.560	1165.160	length
1165.160	1166.720	the
1166.720	1167.080	hour
1167.080	1167.440	of
1167.440	1167.600	shutting
1167.600	1167.840	up
1167.840	1168.320	the
1168.320	1168.800	countinghouse
1168.800	1169.160	arrived.
1169.160	1169.480	With
1169.480	1170.680	an
1170.680	1170.920	ill-will
1170.920	1171.200	Scrooge
1171.200	1172.080	dismounted
1172.080	1172.520	from
1172.520	1172.800	his
1172.800	1173.000	stool,
1173.000	1173.080	and
1173.080	1173.520	tacitly
1173.520	1174.680	admitted
1174.680	1175.000	the
1175.000	1175.440	fact
1175.440	1175.560	to
1175.560	1175.920	the
1175.920	1176.120	expectant
1176.120	1176.520	clerk
1176.520	1176.800	in
1176.800	1177.200	the
1177.200	1177.280	Tank,
1177.280	1177.400	who
1177.400	1177.800	instantly
1177.800	1178.680	snuffed
1178.680	1178.960	his
1178.960	1179.280	candle
1179.280	1179.560	out,
1179.560	1179.880	and
1179.880	1179.960	put
1179.960	1180.320	on
1180.320	1180.600	his
1180.600	1180.760	hat.
1180.760	1180.920	“You’ll
1180.920	1181.920	want
1181.920	1182.160	all
1182.160	1182.440	day
1182.440	1182.680	to-morrow,
1182.680	1182.920	I
1182.920	1183.680	suppose?”
1183.680	1184.600	said
1184.600	1185.040	Scrooge.
1185.040	1185.280	“If
1185.280	1185.760	quite
1185.760	1187.000	convenient,
1187.000	1187.520	sir.”
1187.520	1187.800	“It’s
1187.800	1187.880	not
1187.880	1188.840	convenient,”
1188.840	1189.200	said
1189.200	1189.720	Scrooge,
1189.720	1189.920	“and
1189.920	1190.680	it’s
1190.680	1190.800	not
1190.800	1190.960	fair.
1190.960	1191.160	If
1191.160	1192.040	I
1192.040	1192.160	was
1192.160	1192.360	to
1192.360	1192.560	stop
1192.560	1193.080	half-a-crown
1193.080	1193.280	for
1193.280	1193.680	it,
1193.680	1193.920	you’d
1193.920	1194.200	think
1194.200	1194.680	yourself
1194.680	1194.920	ill-used,
1194.920	1195.360	I’ll
1195.360	1196.160	be
1196.160	1196.480	bound?”
1196.480	1196.840	The
1196.840	1197.080	clerk
1197.080	1198.040	smiled
1198.040	1198.360	faintly.
1198.360	1198.720	“And
1198.720	1199.040	yet,”
1199.040	1199.880	said
1199.880	1200.280	Scrooge,
1200.280	1200.760	“you
1200.760	1201.640	don’t
1201.640	1201.800	think
1201.800	1202.080	me
1202.080	1202.360	ill-used,
1202.360	1203.080	when
1203.080	1203.760	I
1203.760	1204.480	pay
1204.480	1204.720	a
1204.720	1204.960	day’s
1204.960	1205.120	wages
1205.120	1205.400	for
1205.400	1205.920	no
1205.920	1206.480	work.”
1206.480	1206.560	The
1206.560	1207.920	clerk
1207.920	1208.120	observed
1208.120	1208.440	that
1208.440	1208.920	it
1208.920	1209.040	was
1209.040	1209.160	only
1209.160	1209.320	once
1209.320	1209.560	a
1209.560	1209.960	year.
1209.960	1210.000	“A
1210.000	1210.280	poor
1210.280	1211.720	excuse
1211.720	1212.040	for
1212.040	1212.520	picking
1212.520	1212.800	a
1212.800	1213.080	man’s
1213.080	1213.200	pocket
1213.200	1213.640	every
1213.640	1214.280	twenty-fifth
1214.280	1214.520	of
1214.520	1215.040	December!”
1215.040	1215.360	said
1215.360	1216.040	Scrooge,
1216.040	1216.320	buttoning
1216.320	1217.360	his
1217.360	1217.720	great-coat
1217.720	1218.040	to
1218.040	1218.520	the
1218.520	1218.640	chin.
1218.640	1218.720	“But
1218.720	1219.160	I
1219.160	1220.360	suppose
1220.360	1220.520	you
1220.520	1221.240	must
1221.240	1221.320	have
1221.320	1221.600	the
1221.600	1221.800	whole
1221.800	1221.880	day.
1221.880	1222.280	Be
1222.280	1222.600	here
1222.600	1223.280	all
1223.280	1223.560	the
1223.560	1223.840	earlier
1223.840	1224.120	next
1224.120	1224.760	morning.”
1224.760	1225.000	The
1225.000	1226.240	clerk
1226.240	1226.280	promised
1226.280	1226.360	that
1226.360	1226.680	he
1226.680	1227.000	would;
1227.000	1227.160	and
1227.160	1227.760	Scrooge
1227.760	1228.000	walked
1228.000	1228.440	out
1228.440	1228.720	with
1228.720	1228.920	a
1228.920	1229.000	growl.
1229.000	1229.040	The
1229.040	1230.360	office
1230.360	1230.480	was
1230.480	1230.880	closed
1230.880	1231.040	in
1231.040	1231.560	a
1231.560	1231.680	twinkling,
1231.680	1231.840	and
1231.840	1232.320	the
1232.320	1232.720	clerk,
1232.720	1232.920	with
1232.920	1233.520	the
1233.520	1233.560	long
1233.560	1233.720	ends
1233.720	1234.160	of
1234.160	1234.480	his
1234.480	1234.560	white
1234.560	1234.840	comforter
1234.840	1235.200	dangling
1235.200	1235.320	below
1235.320	1235.760	his
1235.760	1236.400	waist
1236.400	1236.640	(for
1236.640	1237.000	he
1237.000	1237.400	boasted
1237.400	1237.440	no
1237.440	1237.960	great-coat),
1237.960	1238.040	went
1238.040	1238.960	down
1238.960	1239.200	a
1239.200	1239.360	slide
1239.360	1239.480	on
1239.480	1240.040	Cornhill,
1240.040	1240.240	at
1240.240	1240.560	the
1240.560	1240.920	end
1240.920	1241.240	of
1241.240	1241.480	a
1241.480	1241.840	lane
1241.840	1241.960	of
1241.960	1242.040	boys,
1242.040	1242.320	twenty
1242.320	1242.880	times,
1242.880	1243.200	in
1243.200	1243.640	honour
1243.640	1243.840	of
1243.840	1244.240	its
1244.240	1244.400	being
1244.400	1244.640	Christmas
1244.640	1244.920	Eve,
1244.920	1245.240	and
1245.240	1245.560	then
1245.560	1245.720	ran
1245.720	1246.400	home
1246.400	1246.800	to
1246.800	1247.080	Camden
1247.080	1247.240	Town
1247.240	1247.680	as
1247.680	1248.000	hard
1248.000	1248.120	as
1248.120	1248.320	he
1248.320	1248.640	could
1248.640	1248.720	pelt,
1248.720	1249.000	to
1249.000	1249.280	play
1249.280	1249.920	at
1249.920	1250.400	blindman’s-buff.
1250.400	1250.840	Scrooge
1250.840	1252.760	took
1252.760	1253.400	his
1253.400	1253.600	melancholy
1253.600	1253.800	dinner
1253.800	1254.400	in
1254.400	1254.800	his
1254.800	1255.000	usual
1255.000	1255.400	melancholy
1255.400	1255.840	tavern;
1255.840	1256.440	and
1256.440	1256.720	having
1256.720	1257.480	read
1257.480	1257.760	all
1257.760	1257.920	the
1257.920	1258.240	newspapers,
1258.240	1258.400	and
1258.400	1259.240	beguiled
1259.240	1259.480	the
1259.480	1259.840	rest
1259.840	1260.000	of
1260.000	1260.280	the
1260.280	1260.560	evening
1260.560	1260.720	with
1260.720	1261.040	his
1261.040	1261.240	banker’s-book,
1261.240	1261.400	went
1261.400	1262.600	home
1262.600	1262.720	to
1262.720	1263.160	bed.
1263.160	1263.240	He
1263.240	1264.800	lived
1264.800	1264.920	in
1264.920	1265.200	chambers
1265.200	1265.360	which
1265.360	1265.880	had
1265.880	1265.960	once
1265.960	1266.440	belonged
1266.440	1266.760	to
1266.760	1267.280	his
1267.280	1267.440	deceased
1267.440	1267.840	partner.
1267.840	1268.080	They
1268.080	1269.360	were
1269.360	1269.480	a
1269.480	1269.680	gloomy
1269.680	1269.840	suite
1269.840	1270.160	of
1270.160	1270.560	rooms,
1270.560	1270.840	in
1270.840	1270.960	a
1270.960	1271.400	lowering
1271.400	1271.520	pile
1271.520	1272.160	of
1272.160	1272.480	building
1272.480	1272.720	up
1272.720	1273.240	a
1273.240	1273.360	yard,
1273.360	1273.560	where
1273.560	1273.760	it
1273.760	1274.600	had
1274.600	1274.880	so
1274.880	1275.200	little
1275.200	1275.280	business
1275.280	1275.600	to
1275.600	1275.840	be,
1275.840	1276.080	that
1276.080	1276.320	one
1276.320	1277.000	could
1277.000	1277.040	scarcely
1277.040	1277.280	help
1277.280	1277.800	fancying
1277.800	1277.960	it
1277.960	1278.520	must
1278.520	1278.760	have
1278.760	1278.920	run
1278.920	1279.160	there
1279.160	1279.360	when
1279.360	1279.560	it
1279.560	1279.680	was
1279.680	1279.680	a
1279.680	1280.000	young
1280.000	1280.120	house,
1280.120	1280.480	playing
1280.480	1280.800	at
1280.800	1281.680	hide-and-seek
1281.680	1281.920	with
1281.920	1282.560	other
1282.560	1282.720	houses,
1282.720	1282.960	and
1282.960	1283.800	forgotten
1283.800	1283.920	the
1283.920	1284.360	way
1284.360	1284.400	out
1284.400	1284.720	again.
1284.720	1284.840	It
1284.840	1286.040	was
1286.040	1286.200	old
1286.200	1286.360	enough
1286.360	1286.560	now,
1286.560	1286.840	and
1286.840	1287.200	dreary
1287.200	1287.800	enough,
1287.800	1288.240	for
1288.240	1288.760	nobody
1288.760	1289.080	lived
1289.080	1289.320	in
1289.320	1289.320	it
1289.320	1289.560	but
1289.560	1289.680	Scrooge,
1289.680	1289.960	the
1289.960	1290.360	other
1290.360	1291.280	rooms
1291.280	1291.480	being
1291.480	1291.960	all
1291.960	1292.120	let
1292.120	1292.320	out
1292.320	1292.560	as
1292.560	1292.880	offices.
1292.880	1293.000	The
1293.000	1293.600	yard
1293.600	1294.680	was
1294.680	1294.960	so
1294.960	1295.120	dark
1295.120	1295.320	that
1295.320	1295.480	even
1295.480	1295.840	Scrooge,
1295.840	1296.360	who
1296.360	1296.920	knew
1296.920	1297.360	its
1297.360	1297.640	every
1297.640	1297.960	stone,
1297.960	1298.400	was
1298.400	1299.000	fain
1299.000	1299.440	to
1299.440	1299.880	grope
1299.880	1300.080	with
1300.080	1300.400	his
1300.400	1300.720	hands.
1300.720	1300.880	The
1300.880	1301.360	fog
1301.360	1302.240	and
1302.240	1302.760	frost
1302.760	1302.920	so
1302.920	1303.400	hung
1303.400	1303.880	about
1303.880	1304.200	the
1304.200	1304.560	black
1304.560	1304.600	old
1304.600	1305.000	gateway
1305.000	1305.320	of
1305.320	1305.640	the
1305.640	1305.760	house,
1305.760	1305.920	that
1305.920	1306.120	it
1306.120	1306.760	seemed
1306.760	1307.000	as
1307.000	1307.240	if
1307.240	1307.400	the
1307.400	1307.720	Genius
1307.720	1307.920	of
1307.920	1308.280	the
1308.280	1308.520	Weather
1308.520	1308.640	sat
1308.640	1308.960	in
1308.960	1309.360	mournful
1309.360	1309.720	meditation
1309.720	1309.960	on
1309.960	1310.600	the
1310.600	1310.840	threshold.
1310.840	1310.960	Now,
1310.960	1311.280	it
1311.280	1311.680	is
1311.680	1313.000	a
1313.000	1313.360	fact,
1313.360	1313.560	that
1313.560	1314.120	there
1314.120	1314.360	was
1314.360	1314.560	nothing
1314.560	1314.760	at
1314.760	1315.160	all
1315.160	1315.360	particular
1315.360	1315.720	about
1315.720	1316.200	the
1316.200	1316.440	knocker
1316.440	1316.480	on
1316.480	1316.840	the
1316.840	1317.000	door,
1317.000	1317.280	except
1317.280	1317.600	that
1317.600	1318.520	it
1318.520	1318.760	was
1318.760	1318.840	very
1318.840	1319.040	large.
1319.040	1319.360	It
1319.360	1319.600	is
1319.600	1320.600	also
1320.600	1320.720	a
1320.720	1321.040	fact,
1321.040	1321.200	that
1321.200	1321.600	Scrooge
1321.600	1321.960	had
1321.960	1322.520	seen
1322.520	1322.600	it,
1322.600	1322.880	night
1322.880	1323.080	and
1323.080	1323.720	morning,
1323.720	1324.120	during
1324.120	1324.520	his
1324.520	1324.920	whole
1324.920	1325.160	residence
1325.160	1325.480	in
1325.480	1325.880	that
1325.880	1326.120	place;
1326.120	1326.440	also
1326.440	1327.520	that
1327.520	1328.080	Scrooge
1328.080	1328.440	had
1328.440	1329.040	as
1329.040	1329.360	little
1329.360	1329.640	of
1329.640	1330.040	what
1330.040	1330.280	is
1330.280	1330.640	called
1330.640	1330.840	fancy
1330.840	1331.160	about
1331.160	1331.960	him
1331.960	1332.360	as
1332.360	1332.560	any
1332.560	1333.200	man
1333.200	1333.520	in
1333.520	1333.680	the
1333.680	1333.960	city
1333.960	1334.080	of
1334.080	1334.400	London,
1334.400	1334.680	even
1334.680	1335.280	including
1335.280	1335.760	—
1335.760	1336.120	which
1336.120	1336.800	is
1336.800	1336.880	a
1336.880	1337.480	bold
1337.480	1337.520	word
1337.520	1337.520	—
1337.520	1338.000	the
1338.000	1338.520	corporation,
1338.520	1338.800	aldermen,
1338.800	1339.640	and
1339.640	1340.640	livery.
1340.640	1341.240	Let
1341.240	1341.520	it
1341.520	1343.080	also
1343.080	1343.200	be
1343.200	1343.560	borne
1343.560	1343.800	in
1343.800	1344.280	mind
1344.280	1344.520	that
1344.520	1345.120	Scrooge
1345.120	1345.480	had
1345.480	1346.080	not
1346.080	1346.400	bestowed
1346.400	1346.720	one
1346.720	1347.160	thought
1347.160	1347.560	on
1347.560	1347.920	Marley,
1347.920	1348.200	since
1348.200	1348.440	his
1348.440	1349.080	last
1349.080	1349.360	mention
1349.360	1349.720	of
1349.720	1350.080	his
1350.080	1350.280	seven
1350.280	1350.480	years’
1350.480	1350.720	dead
1350.720	1351.120	partner
1351.120	1351.480	that
1351.480	1351.840	afternoon.
1351.840	1352.160	And
1352.160	1352.600	then
1352.600	1354.080	let
1354.080	1354.240	any
1354.240	1354.960	man
1354.960	1355.440	explain
1355.440	1355.680	to
1355.680	1356.040	me,
1356.040	1356.240	if
1356.240	1356.400	he
1356.400	1356.960	can,
1356.960	1357.200	how
1357.200	1357.360	it
1357.360	1358.200	happened
1358.200	1358.360	that
1358.360	1358.760	Scrooge,
1358.760	1359.000	having
1359.000	1359.640	his
1359.640	1360.200	key
1360.200	1360.400	in
1360.400	1360.640	the
1360.640	1360.920	lock
1360.920	1361.080	of
1361.080	1361.320	the
1361.320	1361.560	door,
1361.560	1361.760	saw
1361.760	1362.040	in
1362.040	1362.920	the
1362.920	1363.200	knocker,
1363.200	1363.400	without
1363.400	1363.800	its
1363.800	1364.560	undergoing
1364.560	1364.720	any
1364.720	1365.400	intermediate
1365.400	1365.920	process
1365.920	1366.400	of
1366.400	1367.040	change
1367.040	1367.120	—
1367.120	1367.240	not
1367.240	1367.800	a
1367.800	1367.800	knocker,
1367.800	1368.600	but
1368.600	1368.840	Marley’s
1368.840	1369.920	face.
1369.920	1370.600	Marley’s
1370.600	1372.080	face.
1372.080	1372.480	It
1372.480	1372.840	was
1372.840	1373.600	not
1373.600	1373.720	in
1373.720	1374.160	impenetrable
1374.160	1374.480	shadow
1374.480	1374.960	as
1374.960	1375.360	the
1375.360	1375.600	other
1375.600	1376.000	objects
1376.000	1376.320	in
1376.320	1376.760	the
1376.760	1376.880	yard
1376.880	1376.880	were,
1376.880	1377.160	but
1377.160	1377.520	had
1377.520	1378.080	a
1378.080	1378.240	dismal
1378.240	1378.520	light
1378.520	1379.080	about
1379.080	1379.160	it,
1379.160	1379.480	like
1379.480	1379.680	a
1379.680	1380.160	bad
1380.160	1380.560	lobster
1380.560	1380.720	in
1380.720	1381.000	a
1381.000	1381.360	dark
1381.360	1381.640	cellar.
1381.640	1381.800	It
1381.800	1382.240	was
1382.240	1383.280	not
1383.280	1383.400	angry
1383.400	1383.600	or
1383.600	1384.320	ferocious,
1384.320	1384.480	but
1384.480	1384.960	looked
1384.960	1385.600	at
1385.600	1386.040	Scrooge
1386.040	1386.120	as
1386.120	1386.560	Marley
1386.560	1387.080	used
1387.080	1387.200	to
1387.200	1387.360	look:
1387.360	1387.600	with
1387.600	1387.920	ghostly
1387.920	1388.680	spectacles
1388.680	1389.200	turned
1389.200	1389.760	up
1389.760	1390.080	on
1390.080	1390.320	its
1390.320	1390.720	ghostly
1390.720	1390.880	forehead.
1390.880	1391.480	The
1391.480	1391.880	hair
1391.880	1393.120	was
1393.120	1393.560	curiously
1393.560	1393.760	stirred,
1393.760	1394.280	as
1394.280	1394.560	if
1394.560	1395.360	by
1395.360	1395.680	breath
1395.680	1395.960	or
1395.960	1396.080	hot
1396.080	1396.680	air;
1396.680	1396.880	and,
1396.880	1397.160	though
1397.160	1398.160	the
1398.160	1398.720	eyes
1398.720	1398.880	were
1398.880	1399.280	wide
1399.280	1399.480	open,
1399.480	1399.760	they
1399.760	1400.040	were
1400.040	1401.080	perfectly
1401.080	1401.400	motionless.
1401.400	1401.840	That,
1401.840	1402.120	and
1402.120	1403.160	its
1403.160	1403.960	livid
1403.960	1404.080	colour,
1404.080	1404.480	made
1404.480	1404.800	it
1404.800	1405.360	horrible;
1405.360	1405.480	but
1405.480	1406.000	its
1406.000	1407.080	horror
1407.080	1407.280	seemed
1407.280	1407.680	to
1407.680	1408.160	be
1408.160	1408.440	in
1408.440	1408.640	spite
1408.640	1408.760	of
1408.760	1409.280	the
1409.280	1409.600	face
1409.600	1409.720	and
1409.720	1410.240	beyond
1410.240	1410.400	its
1410.400	1410.720	control,
1410.720	1410.960	rather
1410.960	1411.280	than
1411.280	1412.320	a
1412.320	1412.640	part
1412.640	1412.680	or
1412.680	1412.840	its
1412.840	1412.960	own
1412.960	1413.400	expression.
1413.400	1413.560	As
1413.560	1414.160	Scrooge
1414.160	1415.480	looked
1415.480	1416.040	fixedly
1416.040	1416.360	at
1416.360	1416.680	this
1416.680	1416.920	phenomenon,
1416.920	1417.040	it
1417.040	1417.480	was
1417.480	1418.000	a
1418.000	1418.640	knocker
1418.640	1418.800	again.
1418.800	1419.040	To
1419.040	1419.400	say
1419.400	1419.520	that
1419.520	1421.240	he
1421.240	1421.400	was
1421.400	1421.520	not
1421.520	1421.680	startled,
1421.680	1421.960	or
1421.960	1422.400	that
1422.400	1423.280	his
1423.280	1423.480	blood
1423.480	1423.680	was
1423.680	1424.040	not
1424.040	1424.520	conscious
1424.520	1424.800	of
1424.800	1425.040	a
1425.040	1425.480	terrible
1425.480	1425.680	sensation
1425.680	1426.160	to
1426.160	1426.680	which
1426.680	1426.840	it
1426.840	1427.000	had
1427.000	1427.200	been
1427.200	1427.240	a
1427.240	1427.320	stranger
1427.320	1427.600	from
1427.600	1428.240	infancy,
1428.240	1428.440	would
1428.440	1428.640	be
1428.640	1429.600	untrue.
1429.600	1429.720	But
1429.720	1430.120	he
1430.120	1430.400	put
1430.400	1431.520	his
1431.520	1431.720	hand
1431.720	1431.840	upon
1431.840	1432.080	the
1432.080	1432.360	key
1432.360	1432.520	he
1432.520	1432.760	had
1432.760	1433.240	relinquished,
1433.240	1433.560	turned
1433.560	1433.760	it
1433.760	1434.840	sturdily,
1434.840	1435.080	walked
1435.080	1435.240	in,
1435.240	1436.120	and
1436.120	1436.360	lighted
1436.360	1437.320	his
1437.320	1437.600	candle.
1437.600	1437.760	He
1437.760	1438.080	did
1438.080	1438.200	pause,
1438.200	1439.560	with
1439.560	1439.600	a
1439.600	1440.640	moment’s
1440.640	1440.720	irresolution,
1440.720	1441.160	before
1441.160	1441.640	he
1441.640	1442.320	shut
1442.320	1442.480	the
1442.480	1442.640	door;
1442.640	1442.800	and
1442.800	1443.000	he
1443.000	1443.240	did
1443.240	1444.280	look
1444.280	1444.640	cautiously
1444.640	1444.840	behind
1444.840	1445.280	it
1445.280	1445.520	first,
1445.520	1445.840	as
1445.840	1446.080	if
1446.080	1446.560	he
1446.560	1447.080	half-expected
1447.080	1447.320	to
1447.320	1448.000	be
1448.000	1448.360	terrified
1448.360	1448.560	with
1448.560	1448.960	the
1448.960	1449.160	sight
1449.160	1449.200	of
1449.200	1449.600	Marley’s
1449.600	1450.000	pigtail
1450.000	1450.280	sticking
1450.280	1450.600	out
1450.600	1451.000	into
1451.000	1451.280	the
1451.280	1451.520	hall.
1451.520	1451.680	But
1451.680	1452.000	there
1452.000	1453.400	was
1453.400	1453.600	nothing
1453.600	1453.640	on
1453.640	1453.880	the
1453.880	1454.200	back
1454.200	1454.360	of
1454.360	1454.480	the
1454.480	1454.640	door,
1454.640	1454.800	except
1454.800	1455.000	the
1455.000	1455.560	screws
1455.560	1455.680	and
1455.680	1456.440	nuts
1456.440	1456.720	that
1456.720	1457.040	held
1457.040	1457.200	the
1457.200	1457.400	knocker
1457.400	1457.520	on,
1457.520	1457.600	so
1457.600	1458.040	he
1458.040	1459.240	said
1459.240	1459.360	“Pooh,
1459.360	1459.560	pooh!”
1459.560	1459.640	and
1459.640	1459.960	closed
1459.960	1460.160	it
1460.160	1460.520	with
1460.520	1460.960	a
1460.960	1461.400	bang.
1461.400	1461.680	The
1461.680	1462.320	sound
1462.320	1463.400	resounded
1463.400	1463.840	through
