1463.840	1464.400	the
1464.400	1464.640	house
1464.640	1464.720	like
1464.720	1465.080	thunder.
1465.080	1465.360	Every
1465.360	1465.800	room
1465.800	1466.760	above,
1466.760	1467.160	and
1467.160	1467.600	every
1467.600	1468.080	cask
1468.080	1468.520	in
1468.520	1468.920	the
1468.920	1469.480	wine-merchant’s
1469.480	1469.760	cellars
1469.760	1470.320	below,
1470.320	1470.800	appeared
1470.800	1471.080	to
1471.080	1471.840	have
1471.840	1472.080	a
1472.080	1472.200	separate
1472.200	1472.400	peal
1472.400	1472.880	of
1472.880	1473.280	echoes
1473.280	1473.600	of
1473.600	1473.840	its
1473.840	1474.320	own.
1474.320	1474.520	Scrooge
1474.520	1475.560	was
1475.560	1475.920	not
1475.920	1476.160	a
1476.160	1476.320	man
1476.320	1476.600	to
1476.600	1476.760	be
1476.760	1476.920	frightened
1476.920	1477.040	by
1477.040	1477.400	echoes.
1477.400	1477.560	He
1477.560	1478.080	fastened
1478.080	1478.800	the
1478.800	1478.880	door,
1478.880	1479.360	and
1479.360	1479.440	walked
1479.440	1480.240	across
1480.240	1480.560	the
1480.560	1480.760	hall,
1480.760	1481.200	and
1481.200	1481.280	up
1481.280	1481.560	the
1481.560	1481.840	stairs;
1481.840	1482.200	slowly
1482.200	1483.080	too:
1483.080	1484.320	trimming
1484.320	1484.800	his
1484.800	1485.720	candle
1485.720	1485.880	as
1485.880	1486.120	he
1486.120	1486.480	went.
1486.480	1486.600	You
1486.600	1486.880	may
1486.880	1488.600	talk
1488.600	1488.800	vaguely
1488.800	1489.160	about
1489.160	1489.720	driving
1489.720	1489.840	a
1489.840	1490.560	coach-and-six
1490.560	1490.800	up
1490.800	1491.440	a
1491.440	1491.880	good
1491.880	1492.040	old
1492.040	1492.240	flight
1492.240	1492.360	of
1492.360	1492.760	stairs,
1492.760	1492.920	or
1492.920	1493.000	through
1493.000	1493.840	a
1493.840	1494.080	bad
1494.080	1494.480	young
1494.480	1494.840	Act
1494.840	1494.960	of
1494.960	1495.360	Parliament;
1495.360	1495.720	but
1495.720	1495.720	I
1495.720	1496.680	mean
1496.680	1496.680	to
1496.680	1496.880	say
1496.880	1497.200	you
1497.200	1497.280	might
1497.280	1497.680	have
1497.680	1497.840	got
1497.840	1498.240	a
1498.240	1498.360	hearse
1498.360	1498.600	up
1498.600	1498.720	that
1498.720	1499.200	staircase,
1499.200	1499.520	and
1499.520	1499.920	taken
1499.920	1500.600	it
1500.600	1500.960	broadwise,
1500.960	1501.080	with
1501.080	1501.360	the
1501.360	1502.600	splinter-bar
1502.600	1503.000	towards
1503.000	1503.560	the
1503.560	1503.960	wall
1503.960	1504.160	and
1504.160	1504.400	the
1504.400	1504.800	door
1504.800	1505.240	towards
1505.240	1505.400	the
1505.400	1506.080	balustrades:
1506.080	1506.320	and
1506.320	1506.520	done
1506.520	1507.600	it
1507.600	1507.760	easy.
1507.760	1507.960	There
1507.960	1508.160	was
1508.160	1509.880	plenty
1509.880	1509.960	of
1509.960	1510.280	width
1510.280	1510.480	for
1510.480	1510.600	that,
1510.600	1511.000	and
1511.000	1511.200	room
1511.200	1511.640	to
1511.640	1511.880	spare;
1511.880	1512.120	which
1512.120	1512.320	is
1512.320	1513.480	perhaps
1513.480	1513.680	the
1513.680	1514.120	reason
1514.120	1514.280	why
1514.280	1514.720	Scrooge
1514.720	1515.040	thought
1515.040	1515.360	he
1515.360	1515.720	saw
1515.720	1515.960	a
1515.960	1516.480	locomotive
1516.480	1516.600	hearse
1516.600	1516.960	going
1516.960	1517.080	on
1517.080	1517.680	before
1517.680	1517.960	him
1517.960	1518.200	in
1518.200	1518.560	the
1518.560	1518.800	gloom.
1518.800	1519.040	Half
1519.040	1519.040	a
1519.040	1520.480	dozen
1520.480	1520.840	gas-lamps
1520.840	1521.160	out
1521.160	1521.520	of
1521.520	1521.880	the
1521.880	1522.120	street
1522.120	1522.280	wouldn’t
1522.280	1522.720	have
1522.720	1523.200	lighted
1523.200	1523.280	the
1523.280	1523.560	entry
1523.560	1523.800	too
1523.800	1523.800	well,
1523.800	1524.120	so
1524.120	1524.320	you
1524.320	1525.080	may
1525.080	1525.360	suppose
1525.360	1525.520	that
1525.520	1525.880	it
1525.880	1526.240	was
1526.240	1526.440	pretty
1526.440	1526.560	dark
1526.560	1526.920	with
1526.920	1527.400	Scrooge’s
1527.400	1527.440	dip.
1527.440	1527.720	Up
1527.720	1528.200	Scrooge
1528.200	1529.040	went,
1529.040	1529.320	not
1529.320	1529.720	caring
1529.720	1530.440	a
1530.440	1530.680	button
1530.680	1531.000	for
1531.000	1531.320	that.
1531.320	1531.720	Darkness
1531.720	1532.000	is
1532.000	1533.000	cheap,
1533.000	1533.480	and
1533.480	1533.880	Scrooge
1533.880	1534.440	liked
1534.440	1534.760	it.
1534.760	1535.000	But
1535.000	1535.240	before
1535.240	1536.440	he
1536.440	1536.640	shut
1536.640	1537.000	his
1537.000	1537.200	heavy
1537.200	1537.520	door,
1537.520	1537.680	he
1537.680	1538.000	walked
1538.000	1538.520	through
1538.520	1538.800	his
1538.800	1539.200	rooms
1539.200	1539.400	to
1539.400	1539.680	see
1539.680	1540.040	that
1540.040	1540.120	all
1540.120	1540.520	was
1540.520	1540.680	right.
1540.680	1540.840	He
1540.840	1541.120	had
1541.120	1542.280	just
1542.280	1542.560	enough
1542.560	1543.040	recollection
1543.040	1543.360	of
1543.360	1543.720	the
1543.720	1544.080	face
1544.080	1544.200	to
1544.200	1544.440	desire
1544.440	1544.920	to
1544.920	1544.920	do
1544.920	1545.360	that.
1545.360	1545.560	Sitting-room,
1545.560	1545.920	bedroom,
1545.920	1548.120	lumber-room.
1548.120	1549.000	All
1549.000	1549.960	as
1549.960	1551.120	they
1551.120	1551.480	should
1551.480	1551.680	be.
1551.680	1552.000	Nobody
1552.000	1552.240	under
1552.240	1553.280	the
1553.280	1553.600	table,
1553.600	1553.840	nobody
1553.840	1554.080	under
1554.080	1554.600	the
1554.600	1554.960	sofa;
1554.960	1555.160	a
1555.160	1555.240	small
1555.240	1555.640	fire
1555.640	1556.440	in
1556.440	1556.880	the
1556.880	1557.280	grate;
1557.280	1557.400	spoon
1557.400	1557.560	and
1557.560	1558.360	basin
1558.360	1558.560	ready;
1558.560	1558.920	and
1558.920	1559.280	the
1559.280	1560.240	little
1560.240	1560.560	saucepan
1560.560	1560.600	of
1560.600	1561.000	gruel
1561.000	1561.600	(Scrooge
1561.600	1561.960	had
1561.960	1562.640	a
1562.640	1562.960	cold
1562.960	1563.040	in
1563.040	1563.120	his
1563.120	1563.640	head)
1563.640	1563.760	upon
1563.760	1563.920	the
1563.920	1564.720	hob.
1564.720	1565.120	Nobody
1565.120	1565.480	under
1565.480	1566.840	the
1566.840	1567.160	bed;
1567.160	1567.440	nobody
1567.440	1567.680	in
1567.680	1568.160	the
1568.160	1568.440	closet;
1568.440	1568.600	nobody
1568.600	1568.840	in
1568.840	1569.480	his
1569.480	1569.800	dressing-gown,
1569.800	1569.920	which
1569.920	1570.360	was
1570.360	1571.080	hanging
1571.080	1571.240	up
1571.240	1571.360	in
1571.360	1571.680	a
1571.680	1571.920	suspicious
1571.920	1572.040	attitude
1572.040	1572.760	against
1572.760	1573.040	the
1573.040	1573.320	wall.
1573.320	1573.640	Lumber-room
1573.640	1574.000	as
1574.000	1575.600	usual.
1575.600	1575.880	Old
1575.880	1576.400	fire-guards,
1576.400	1577.400	old
1577.400	1577.720	shoes,
1577.720	1578.240	two
1578.240	1579.160	fish-baskets,
1579.160	1580.240	washing-stand
1580.240	1580.920	on
1580.920	1581.680	three
1581.680	1582.200	legs,
1582.200	1582.400	and
1582.400	1582.720	a
1582.720	1583.320	poker.
1583.320	1583.520	Quite
1583.520	1584.000	satisfied,
1584.000	1585.280	he
1585.280	1585.800	closed
1585.800	1586.200	his
1586.200	1586.280	door,
1586.280	1586.680	and
1586.680	1586.920	locked
1586.920	1587.640	himself
1587.640	1587.800	in;
1587.800	1588.240	double-locked
1588.240	1589.440	himself
1589.440	1589.760	in,
1589.760	1590.040	which
1590.040	1590.480	was
1590.480	1590.720	not
1590.720	1591.520	his
1591.520	1591.840	custom.
1591.840	1592.000	Thus
1592.000	1593.520	secured
1593.520	1593.760	against
1593.760	1594.400	surprise,
1594.400	1594.640	he
1594.640	1594.880	took
1594.880	1595.520	off
1595.520	1595.880	his
1595.880	1596.160	cravat;
1596.160	1596.400	put
1596.400	1596.520	on
1596.520	1596.920	his
1596.920	1598.120	dressing-gown
1598.120	1598.240	and
1598.240	1598.680	slippers,
1598.680	1598.960	and
1598.960	1599.120	his
1599.120	1600.080	nightcap;
1600.080	1600.200	and
1600.200	1600.480	sat
1600.480	1600.760	down
1600.760	1601.880	before
1601.880	1602.160	the
1602.160	1602.440	fire
1602.440	1602.760	to
1602.760	1602.840	take
1602.840	1603.360	his
1603.360	1603.480	gruel.
1603.480	1603.640	It
1603.640	1603.840	was
1603.840	1605.840	a
1605.840	1605.960	very
1605.960	1606.120	low
1606.120	1606.280	fire
1606.280	1606.560	indeed;
1606.560	1607.160	nothing
1607.160	1607.360	on
1607.360	1607.920	such
1607.920	1608.880	a
1608.880	1609.080	bitter
1609.080	1609.400	night.
1609.400	1609.600	He
1609.600	1609.800	was
1609.800	1610.880	obliged
1610.880	1610.960	to
1610.960	1611.200	sit
1611.200	1611.920	close
1611.920	1612.240	to
1612.240	1612.560	it,
1612.560	1612.880	and
1612.880	1612.920	brood
1612.920	1613.160	over
1613.160	1613.480	it,
1613.480	1613.800	before
1613.800	1613.920	he
1613.920	1614.200	could
1614.200	1614.640	extract
1614.640	1614.800	the
1614.800	1615.360	least
1615.360	1615.640	sensation
1615.640	1615.760	of
1615.760	1616.280	warmth
1616.280	1616.600	from
1616.600	1616.840	such
1616.840	1617.200	a
1617.200	1617.480	handful
1617.480	1617.680	of
1617.680	1618.000	fuel.
1618.000	1618.360	The
1618.360	1618.600	fireplace
1618.600	1619.800	was
1619.800	1619.960	an
1619.960	1620.600	old
1620.600	1620.760	one,
1620.760	1620.840	built
1620.840	1621.240	by
1621.240	1621.480	some
1621.480	1622.240	Dutch
1622.240	1622.560	merchant
1622.560	1622.840	long
1622.840	1623.120	ago,
1623.120	1623.520	and
1623.520	1623.760	paved
1623.760	1624.080	all
1624.080	1624.440	round
1624.440	1624.720	with
1624.720	1625.320	quaint
1625.320	1625.520	Dutch
1625.520	1625.880	tiles,
1625.880	1626.200	designed
1626.200	1626.560	to
1626.560	1627.880	illustrate
1627.880	1628.200	the
1628.200	1628.840	Scriptures.
1628.840	1629.000	There
1629.000	1629.240	were
1629.240	1630.480	Cains
1630.480	1630.680	and
1630.680	1631.040	Abels,
1631.040	1631.360	Pharaohs’
1631.360	1631.680	daughters;
1631.680	1632.680	Queens
1632.680	1633.000	of
1633.000	1633.760	Sheba,
1633.760	1634.320	Angelic
1634.320	1634.760	messengers
1634.760	1635.600	descending
1635.600	1636.120	through
1636.120	1636.440	the
1636.440	1637.040	air
1637.040	1637.440	on
1637.440	1637.800	clouds
1637.800	1638.080	like
1638.080	1638.640	feather-beds,
1638.640	1639.080	Abrahams,
1639.080	1639.720	Belshazzars,
1639.720	1641.200	Apostles
1641.200	1642.240	putting
1642.240	1643.280	off
1643.280	1643.800	to
1643.800	1644.280	sea
1644.280	1644.600	in
1644.600	1644.880	butter-boats,
1644.880	1645.440	hundreds
1645.440	1645.720	of
1645.720	1646.720	figures
1646.720	1647.160	to
1647.160	1647.560	attract
1647.560	1647.880	his
1647.880	1648.280	thoughts
1648.280	1648.440	—
1648.440	1648.600	and
1648.600	1649.120	yet
1649.120	1650.200	that
1650.200	1650.360	face
1650.360	1650.520	of
1650.520	1650.760	Marley,
1650.760	1651.080	seven
1651.080	1651.320	years
1651.320	1652.280	dead,
1652.280	1652.760	came
1652.760	1653.280	like
1653.280	1654.160	the
1654.160	1654.640	ancient
1654.640	1655.120	Prophet’s
1655.120	1655.200	rod,
1655.200	1655.640	and
1655.640	1656.160	swallowed
1656.160	1656.760	up
1656.760	1657.000	the
1657.000	1657.400	whole.
1657.400	1657.400	If
1657.400	1657.800	each
1657.800	1659.160	smooth
1659.160	1659.360	tile
1659.360	1659.880	had
1659.880	1660.560	been
1660.560	1661.120	a
1661.120	1661.240	blank
1661.240	1661.280	at
1661.280	1661.560	first,
1661.560	1662.120	with
1662.120	1662.280	power
1662.280	1663.160	to
1663.160	1663.520	shape
1663.520	1663.920	some
1663.920	1664.200	picture
1664.200	1664.520	on
1664.520	1664.880	its
1664.880	1665.280	surface
1665.280	1665.440	from
1665.440	1665.640	the
1665.640	1666.280	disjointed
1666.280	1666.600	fragments
1666.600	1667.080	of
1667.080	1667.400	his
1667.400	1667.840	thoughts,
1667.840	1667.920	there
1667.920	1668.080	would
1668.080	1668.600	have
1668.600	1669.520	been
1669.520	1669.760	a
1669.760	1670.440	copy
1670.440	1670.480	of
1670.480	1670.480	old
1670.480	1670.720	Marley’s
1670.720	1670.960	head
1670.960	1671.120	on
1671.120	1671.360	every
1671.360	1672.080	one.
1672.080	1672.840	“Humbug!”
1672.840	1673.160	said
1673.160	1675.440	Scrooge;
1675.440	1675.440	and
1675.440	1675.840	walked
1675.840	1676.840	across
1676.840	1677.080	the
1677.080	1677.400	room.
1677.400	1677.840	After
1677.840	1678.120	several
1678.120	1679.600	turns,
1679.600	1679.840	he
1679.840	1680.400	sat
1680.400	1680.880	down
1680.880	1681.000	again.
1681.000	1681.320	As
1681.320	1681.520	he
1681.520	1681.760	threw
1681.760	1683.040	his
1683.040	1683.160	head
1683.160	1683.480	back
1683.480	1683.600	in
1683.600	1683.880	the
1683.880	1684.160	chair,
1684.160	1684.200	his
1684.200	1684.360	glance
1684.360	1684.760	happened
1684.760	1685.000	to
1685.000	1685.320	rest
1685.320	1685.680	upon
1685.680	1685.800	a
1685.800	1686.080	bell,
1686.080	1686.400	a
1686.400	1686.600	disused
1686.600	1686.760	bell,
1686.760	1687.880	that
1687.880	1688.520	hung
1688.520	1688.760	in
1688.760	1689.040	the
1689.040	1689.600	room,
1689.600	1689.760	and
1689.760	1690.160	communicated
1690.160	1690.920	for
1690.920	1691.240	some
1691.240	1691.720	purpose
1691.720	1691.920	now
1691.920	1692.440	forgotten
1692.440	1692.760	with
1692.760	1692.920	a
1692.920	1693.400	chamber
1693.400	1693.920	in
1693.920	1694.040	the
1694.040	1694.520	highest
1694.520	1694.520	story
1694.520	1694.680	of
1694.680	1695.080	the
1695.080	1695.680	building.
1695.680	1695.960	It
1695.960	1696.080	was
1696.080	1697.360	with
1697.360	1697.400	great
1697.400	1697.640	astonishment,
1697.640	1697.840	and
1697.840	1698.280	with
1698.280	1698.960	a
1698.960	1699.440	strange,
1699.440	1699.760	inexplicable
1699.760	1700.240	dread,
1700.240	1700.920	that
1700.920	1701.800	as
1701.800	1702.560	he
1702.560	1703.040	looked,
1703.040	1703.200	he
1703.200	1703.480	saw
1703.480	1703.760	this
1703.760	1704.360	bell
1704.360	1704.640	begin
1704.640	1704.960	to
1704.960	1705.320	swing.
1705.320	1705.400	It
1705.400	1705.840	swung
1705.840	1706.560	so
1706.560	1707.880	softly
1707.880	1708.200	in
1708.200	1708.600	the
1708.600	1709.360	outset
1709.360	1709.560	that
1709.560	1709.680	it
1709.680	1710.040	scarcely
1710.040	1710.280	made
1710.280	1710.400	a
1710.400	1711.040	sound;
1711.040	1711.120	but
1711.120	1711.240	soon
1711.240	1711.760	it
1711.760	1712.520	rang
1712.520	1712.880	out
1712.880	1713.120	loudly,
1713.120	1713.400	and
1713.400	1713.720	so
1713.720	1714.080	did
1714.080	1714.680	every
1714.680	1714.880	bell
1714.880	1715.000	in
1715.000	1715.520	the
1715.520	1716.120	house.
1716.120	1716.240	This
1716.240	1716.440	might
1716.440	1717.040	have
1717.040	1717.680	lasted
1717.680	1717.920	half
1717.920	1718.000	a
1718.000	1718.320	minute,
1718.320	1718.560	or
1718.560	1718.680	a
1718.680	1718.800	minute,
1718.800	1719.720	but
1719.720	1719.960	it
1719.960	1720.360	seemed
1720.360	1721.040	an
1721.040	1721.160	hour.
1721.160	1721.440	The
1721.440	1721.720	bells
1721.720	1723.080	ceased
1723.080	1723.240	as
1723.240	1723.560	they
1723.560	1724.200	had
1724.200	1724.360	begun,
1724.360	1724.560	together.
1724.560	1724.720	They
1724.720	1725.560	were
1725.560	1727.120	succeeded
1727.120	1727.200	by
1727.200	1727.360	a
1727.360	1727.840	clanking
1727.840	1727.960	noise,
1727.960	1728.200	deep
1728.200	1728.600	down
1728.600	1729.080	below;
1729.080	1729.560	as
1729.560	1729.840	if
1729.840	1729.920	some
1729.920	1730.560	person
1730.560	1730.920	were
1730.920	1731.280	dragging
1731.280	1731.600	a
1731.600	1731.840	heavy
1731.840	1732.240	chain
1732.240	1732.480	over
1732.480	1732.760	the
1732.760	1733.240	casks
1733.240	1733.440	in
1733.440	1733.600	the
1733.600	1734.160	wine
1734.160	1734.360	merchant’s
1734.360	1734.600	cellar.
1734.600	1735.040	Scrooge
1735.040	1735.360	then
1735.360	1736.960	remembered
1736.960	1737.120	to
1737.120	1737.360	have
1737.360	1737.920	heard
1737.920	1738.120	that
1738.120	1738.440	ghosts
1738.440	1738.560	in
1738.560	1738.680	haunted
1738.680	1739.160	houses
1739.160	1739.400	were
1739.400	1739.840	described
1739.840	1740.160	as
1740.160	1740.400	dragging
1740.400	1741.040	chains.
1741.040	1741.120	The
1741.120	1741.800	cellar-door
1741.800	1743.320	flew
1743.320	1743.600	open
1743.600	1744.080	with
1744.080	1744.880	a
1744.880	1745.240	booming
1745.240	1745.400	sound,
1745.400	1745.400	and
1745.400	1745.560	then
1745.560	1746.040	he
1746.040	1746.480	heard
1746.480	1746.640	the
1746.640	1746.840	noise
1746.840	1747.240	much
1747.240	1747.360	louder,
1747.360	1747.560	on
1747.560	1747.720	the
1747.720	1748.320	floors
1748.320	1748.600	below;
1748.600	1748.680	then
1748.680	1749.240	coming
1749.240	1749.600	up
1749.600	1750.840	the
1750.840	1751.360	stairs;
1751.360	1751.400	then
1751.400	1751.680	coming
1751.680	1752.400	straight
1752.400	1753.240	towards
1753.240	1753.600	his
1753.600	1754.040	door.
1754.040	1754.480	“It’s
1754.480	1754.720	humbug
1754.720	1756.240	still!”
1756.240	1756.520	said
1756.520	1757.080	Scrooge.
1757.080	1757.200	“I
1757.200	1757.640	won’t
1757.640	1758.040	believe
1758.040	1758.440	it.”
1758.440	1758.680	His
1758.680	1758.760	colour
1758.760	1759.760	changed
1759.760	1759.920	though,
1759.920	1760.240	when,
1760.240	1760.680	without
1760.680	1760.880	a
1760.880	1761.400	pause,
1761.400	1761.960	it
1761.960	1762.200	came
1762.200	1762.560	on
1762.560	1763.320	through
1763.320	1763.560	the
1763.560	1763.840	heavy
1763.840	1764.080	door,
1764.080	1764.240	and
1764.240	1764.520	passed
1764.520	1764.880	into
1764.880	1765.440	the
1765.440	1765.760	room
1765.760	1766.040	before
1766.040	1766.120	his
1766.120	1766.600	eyes.
1766.600	1766.920	Upon
1766.920	1767.080	its
1767.080	1768.000	coming
1768.000	1768.360	in,
1768.360	1768.440	the
1768.440	1768.720	dying
1768.720	1769.080	flame
1769.080	1769.480	leaped
1769.480	1770.000	up,
1770.000	1770.480	as
1770.480	1770.920	though
1770.920	1771.280	it
1771.280	1771.560	cried,
1771.560	1771.760	“I
1771.760	1771.880	know
1771.880	1772.200	him;
1772.200	1772.640	Marley’s
1772.640	1773.120	Ghost!”
1773.120	1773.720	and
1773.720	1774.080	fell
1774.080	1774.560	again.
1774.560	1775.240	The
1775.240	1775.480	same
1775.480	1775.840	face:
1775.840	1776.400	the
1776.400	1776.800	very
1776.800	1777.320	same.
1777.320	1778.000	Marley
1778.000	1778.400	in
1778.400	1779.600	his
1779.600	1780.120	pigtail,
1780.120	1780.160	usual
1780.160	1780.720	waistcoat,
1780.720	1781.760	tights
1781.760	1782.200	and
1782.200	1782.760	boots;
1782.760	1783.120	the
1783.120	1783.600	tassels
1783.600	1784.200	on
1784.200	1784.840	the
1784.840	1785.280	latter
1785.280	1785.600	bristling,
1785.600	1785.720	like
1785.720	1786.080	his
1786.080	1786.680	pigtail,
1786.680	1787.040	and
1787.040	1787.320	his
1787.320	1787.800	coat-skirts,
1787.800	1788.320	and
1788.320	1788.480	the
1788.480	1789.280	hair
1789.280	1789.720	upon
1789.720	1789.880	his
1789.880	1790.200	head.
1790.200	1790.600	The
1790.600	1790.720	chain
1790.720	1792.200	he
1792.200	1792.280	drew
1792.280	1792.680	was
1792.680	1792.960	clasped
1792.960	1793.400	about
1793.400	1793.760	his
1793.760	1794.080	middle.
1794.080	1794.400	It
1794.400	1794.640	was
1794.640	1794.880	long,
1794.880	1795.680	and
1795.680	1795.920	wound
1795.920	1796.720	about
1796.720	1796.880	him
1796.880	1797.040	like
1797.040	1797.240	a
1797.240	1797.400	tail;
1797.400	1797.480	and
1797.480	1797.680	it
1797.680	1798.080	was
1798.080	1798.440	made
1798.440	1798.680	(for
1798.680	1799.120	Scrooge
1799.120	1799.600	observed
1799.600	1799.760	it
1799.760	1800.160	closely)
1800.160	1800.480	of
1800.480	1800.720	cash-boxes,
1800.720	1801.520	keys,
1801.520	1801.920	padlocks,
1801.920	1802.720	ledgers,
1802.720	1803.600	deeds,
1803.600	1804.520	and
1804.520	1805.440	heavy
1805.440	1806.680	purses
1806.680	1806.960	wrought
1806.960	1807.400	in
1807.400	1807.920	steel.
1807.920	1808.560	His
1808.560	1808.720	body
1808.720	1809.280	was
1809.280	1810.640	transparent,
1810.640	1810.920	so
1810.920	1811.120	that
1811.120	1811.960	Scrooge,
1811.960	1812.520	observing
1812.520	1812.600	him,
1812.600	1813.400	and
1813.400	1814.040	looking
1814.040	1814.280	through
1814.280	1814.760	his
1814.760	1815.160	waistcoat,
1815.160	1815.680	could
1815.680	1815.920	see
1815.920	1816.280	the
1816.280	1817.080	two
1817.080	1817.240	buttons
1817.240	1817.440	on
1817.440	1817.720	his
1817.720	1818.280	coat
1818.280	1818.400	behind.
1818.400	1818.680	Scrooge
1818.680	1819.000	had
1819.000	1820.400	often
1820.400	1820.760	heard
1820.760	1820.960	it
1820.960	1821.200	said
1821.200	1821.360	that
1821.360	1821.640	Marley
1821.640	1821.920	had
1821.920	1822.160	no
1822.160	1822.480	bowels,
1822.480	1822.720	but
1822.720	1822.840	he
1822.840	1823.200	had
1823.200	1824.240	never
1824.240	1824.440	believed
1824.440	1824.640	it
1824.640	1824.960	until
1824.960	1825.240	now.
1825.240	1825.400	No,
1825.400	1825.800	nor
1825.800	1826.080	did
1826.080	1826.920	he
1826.920	1827.240	believe
1827.240	1827.920	it
1827.920	1828.040	even
1828.040	1828.400	now.
1828.400	1828.600	Though
1828.600	1828.880	he
1828.880	1829.240	looked
1829.240	1829.880	the
1829.880	1830.080	phantom
1830.080	1830.440	through
1830.440	1830.520	and
1830.520	1830.880	through,
1830.880	1831.120	and
1831.120	1831.800	saw
1831.800	1831.880	it
1831.880	1832.360	standing
1832.360	1832.720	before
1832.720	1832.960	him;
1832.960	1833.440	though
1833.440	1833.680	he
1833.680	1834.000	felt
1834.000	1834.400	the
1834.400	1834.600	chilling
1834.600	1835.040	influence
1835.040	1835.240	of
1835.240	1835.680	its
1835.680	1836.400	death-coldeyes;
1836.400	1836.520	and
1836.520	1837.040	marked
1837.040	1838.200	the
1838.200	1838.520	very
1838.520	1838.960	texture
1838.960	1839.120	of
1839.120	1839.600	the
1839.600	1840.160	folded
1840.160	1840.320	kerchief
1840.320	1840.520	bound
1840.520	1840.960	about
1840.960	1841.640	its
1841.640	1842.080	head
1842.080	1842.480	and
1842.480	1842.560	chin,
1842.560	1842.920	which
1842.920	1843.080	wrapper
1843.080	1843.400	he
1843.400	1843.840	had
1843.840	1844.120	not
1844.120	1844.520	observed
1844.520	1844.720	before:
1844.720	1844.840	he
1844.840	1845.200	was
1845.200	1845.560	still
1845.560	1846.320	incredulous,
1846.320	1846.520	and
1846.520	1846.800	fought
1846.800	1847.560	against
1847.560	1848.080	his
1848.080	1848.360	senses.
1848.360	1848.760	“How
1848.760	1849.280	now!”
1849.280	1849.640	said
1849.640	1851.480	Scrooge,
1851.480	1851.960	caustic
1851.960	1852.440	and
1852.440	1853.120	cold
1853.120	1854.280	as
1854.280	1854.680	ever.
1854.680	1854.920	“What
1854.920	1855.080	do
1855.080	1855.400	you
1855.400	1856.160	want
1856.160	1856.280	with
1856.280	1856.400	me?”
1856.400	1856.720	“Much!”
1856.720	1856.800	—
1856.800	1858.120	Marley’s
1858.120	1859.400	voice,
1859.400	1859.400	no
1859.400	1859.720	doubt
1859.720	1860.160	about
1860.160	1860.760	it.
1860.760	1862.240	“Who
1862.240	1862.640	are
1862.640	1862.760	you?”
1862.760	1862.880	“Ask
1862.880	1863.640	me
1863.640	1863.960	who
1863.960	1864.080	I
1864.080	1864.680	was.”
1864.680	1865.480	“Who
1865.480	1865.960	were
1865.960	1867.680	you
1867.680	1867.920	then?”
1867.920	1868.200	said
1868.200	1868.360	Scrooge,
1868.360	1869.120	raising
1869.120	1869.360	his
1869.360	1870.160	voice.
1870.160	1870.520	“You’re
1870.520	1870.800	particular,
1870.800	1871.760	for
1871.760	1872.040	a
1872.040	1872.640	shade.”
1872.640	1872.880	He
1872.880	1872.960	was
1872.960	1873.280	going
1873.280	1874.360	to
1874.360	1874.520	say
1874.520	1874.800	“to
1874.800	1874.840	a
1874.840	1875.560	shade,”
1875.560	1875.800	but
1875.800	1876.280	substituted
1876.280	1876.280	this,
1876.280	1876.800	as
1876.800	1877.160	more
1877.160	1877.960	appropriate.
1877.960	1878.160	“In
1878.160	1878.440	life
1878.440	1880.040	I
1880.040	1880.280	was
1880.280	1880.880	your
1880.880	1881.320	partner,
1881.320	1881.640	Jacob
1881.640	1882.120	Marley.”
1882.120	1883.400	“Can
1883.400	1883.760	you
1883.760	1883.920	—
1883.920	1883.960	can
1883.960	1884.280	you
1884.280	1886.200	sit
1886.200	1886.600	down?”
1886.600	1888.000	asked
1888.000	1888.560	Scrooge,
1888.560	1888.880	looking
1888.880	1890.040	doubtfully
1890.040	1890.880	at
1890.880	1891.640	him.
1891.640	1892.000	“I
1892.000	1892.240	can.”
1892.240	1893.600	“Do
1893.600	1894.000	it
1894.000	1894.400	then.”
1894.400	1895.640	Scrooge
1895.640	1895.920	asked
1895.920	1896.080	the
1896.080	1897.800	question,
1897.800	1898.040	because
1898.040	1898.360	he
1898.360	1898.880	didn’t
1898.880	1899.400	know
1899.400	1899.520	whether
1899.520	1899.600	a
1899.600	1899.920	ghost
1899.920	1900.120	so
1900.120	1900.400	transparent
1900.400	1900.760	might
1900.760	1901.080	find
1901.080	1901.640	himself
1901.640	1901.880	in
1901.880	1902.200	a
1902.200	1902.480	condition
1902.480	1902.600	to
1902.600	1902.720	take
1902.720	1903.080	a
1903.080	1903.240	chair;
1903.240	1903.440	and
1903.440	1903.640	felt
1903.640	1904.000	that
1904.000	1904.720	in
1904.720	1905.120	the
1905.120	1905.520	event
1905.520	1905.800	of
1905.800	1905.920	its
1905.920	1906.160	being
1906.160	1906.480	impossible,
1906.480	1906.680	it
1906.680	1906.960	might
1906.960	1907.600	involve
1907.600	1908.360	the
1908.360	1908.640	necessity
1908.640	1909.040	of
1909.040	1909.120	an
1909.120	1909.920	embarrassing
1909.920	1910.120	explanation.
1910.120	1910.520	But
1910.520	1910.800	the
1910.800	1911.440	ghost
1911.440	1912.280	sat
1912.280	1912.320	down
1912.320	1912.560	on
1912.560	1912.880	the
1912.880	1913.240	opposite
1913.240	1913.440	side
1913.440	1913.560	of
1913.560	1913.840	the
1913.840	1914.200	fireplace,
1914.200	1914.320	as
1914.320	1914.360	if
1914.360	1914.720	he
1914.720	1915.680	were
1915.680	1915.880	quite
1915.880	1915.960	used
1915.960	1916.200	to
1916.200	1916.400	it.
1916.400	1916.640	“You
1916.640	1916.800	don’t
1916.800	1918.320	believe
1918.320	1918.400	in
1918.400	1918.960	me,”
1918.960	1919.280	observed
1919.280	1919.360	the
1919.360	1920.200	Ghost.
1920.200	1920.600	“I
1920.600	1920.960	don’t.”
1920.960	1922.080	said
1922.080	1922.520	Scrooge.
1922.520	1923.320	“What
1923.320	1923.720	evidence
1923.720	1925.680	would
1925.680	1925.840	you
1925.840	1926.160	have
1926.160	1926.480	of
1926.480	1926.680	my
1926.680	1927.040	reality,
1927.040	1927.400	beyond
1927.400	1927.680	that
1927.680	1928.120	of
1928.120	1928.600	your
1928.600	1928.920	senses?”
1928.920	1929.160	“I
1929.160	1929.440	don’t
1929.440	1931.160	know,”
1931.160	1931.160	said
1931.160	1931.360	Scrooge.
1931.360	1932.120	“Why
1932.120	1932.400	do
1932.400	1932.840	you
1932.840	1933.960	doubt
1933.960	1934.200	your
1934.200	1934.640	senses?”
1934.640	1934.960	“Because,”
1934.960	1936.840	said
1936.840	1936.840	Scrooge,
1936.840	1937.400	“a
1937.400	1937.920	little
1937.920	1938.240	thing
1938.240	1939.120	affects
1939.120	1939.440	them.
1939.440	1939.720	A
1939.720	1940.160	slight
1940.160	1940.440	disorder
1940.440	1941.240	of
1941.240	1941.680	the
1941.680	1941.960	stomach
1941.960	1942.320	makes
1942.320	1942.400	them
1942.400	1943.000	cheats.
1943.000	1943.360	You
1943.360	1943.560	may
1943.560	1943.960	be
1943.960	1944.800	an
1944.800	1945.080	undigested
1945.080	1945.280	bit
1945.280	1945.360	of
1945.360	1945.800	beef,
1945.800	1946.200	a
1946.200	1946.320	blot
1946.320	1946.600	of
1946.600	1947.320	mustard,
1947.320	1947.600	a
1947.600	1947.760	crumb
1947.760	1948.040	of
1948.040	1948.480	cheese,
1948.480	1948.760	a
1948.760	1949.040	fragment
1949.040	1949.320	of
1949.320	1949.480	an
1949.480	1950.600	underdone
1950.600	1950.760	potato.
1950.760	1951.160	There’s
1951.160	1951.400	more
1951.400	1952.640	of
1952.640	1952.800	gravy
1952.800	1952.960	than
1952.960	1953.040	of
1953.040	1953.520	grave
1953.520	1953.880	about
1953.880	1953.960	you,
1953.960	1954.440	whatever
1954.440	1954.720	you
1954.720	1955.120	are!”
1955.120	1956.000	Scrooge
1956.000	1956.200	was
1956.200	1957.960	not
1957.960	1958.280	much
1958.280	1958.440	in
1958.440	1958.640	the
1958.640	1959.040	habit
1959.040	1959.240	of
1959.240	1959.440	cracking
1959.440	1959.760	jokes,
1959.760	1959.880	nor
1959.880	1960.160	did
1960.160	1960.440	he
1960.440	1961.280	feel,
1961.280	1961.600	in
1961.600	1961.720	his
1961.720	1961.880	heart,
1961.880	1962.360	by
1962.360	1962.600	any
1962.600	1962.840	means
1962.840	1963.560	waggish
1963.560	1963.800	then.
1963.800	1964.040	The
1964.040	1964.520	truth
1964.520	1964.680	is,
1964.680	1965.880	that
1965.880	1966.040	he
1966.040	1966.480	tried
1966.480	1967.000	to
1967.000	1967.120	be
1967.120	1967.320	smart,
1967.320	1967.560	as
1967.560	1967.680	a
1967.680	1968.000	means
1968.000	1968.200	of
1968.200	1968.760	distracting
1968.760	1969.200	his
1969.200	1969.360	own
1969.360	1969.960	attention,
1969.960	1970.120	and
1970.120	1970.280	keeping
1970.280	1970.800	down
1970.800	1971.120	his
1971.120	1971.400	terror;
1971.400	1972.000	for
1972.000	1972.120	the
1972.120	1972.800	spectre’s
1972.800	1973.120	voice
1973.120	1973.400	disturbed
1973.400	1973.840	the
1973.840	1974.120	very
1974.120	1974.560	marrow
1974.560	1974.840	in
1974.840	1974.960	his
1974.960	1975.680	bones.
1975.680	1975.880	To
1975.880	1975.960	sit,
1975.960	1976.600	staring
1976.600	1976.720	at
1976.720	1978.080	those
1978.080	1979.000	fixed
1979.000	1979.280	glazed
1979.280	1979.440	eyes,
1979.440	1979.800	in
1979.800	1980.520	silence
1980.520	1981.080	for
1981.080	1981.440	a
1981.440	1981.880	moment,
1981.880	1982.200	would
1982.200	1982.560	play,
1982.560	1982.920	Scrooge
1982.920	1983.320	felt,
1983.320	1983.640	the
1983.640	1984.160	very
1984.160	1984.400	deuce
1984.400	1984.720	with
1984.720	1985.200	him.
1985.200	1985.360	There
1985.360	1985.560	was
1985.560	1985.920	something
1985.920	1986.080	very
1986.080	1987.320	awful,
1987.320	1987.480	too,
1987.480	1987.840	in
1987.840	1988.240	the
1988.240	1988.960	spectre’s
1988.960	1989.280	being
1989.280	1989.600	provided
1989.600	1989.960	with
1989.960	1990.240	an
1990.240	1990.800	infernal
1990.800	1991.080	atmosphere
1991.080	1991.160	of
1991.160	1991.760	its
1991.760	1992.240	own.
1992.240	1992.640	Scrooge
1992.640	1992.840	could
1992.840	1993.240	not
1993.240	1994.240	feel
1994.240	1994.400	it
1994.400	1994.680	himself,
1994.680	1994.960	but
1994.960	1995.160	this
1995.160	1995.360	was
1995.360	1996.400	clearly
1996.400	1996.440	the
1996.440	1996.720	case;
1996.720	1997.080	for
1997.080	1997.360	though
1997.360	1997.560	the
1997.560	1998.520	Ghost
1998.520	1998.720	sat
1998.720	1999.000	perfectly
1999.000	1999.640	motionless,
1999.640	2000.160	its
2000.160	2000.400	hair,
2000.400	2000.600	and
2000.600	2001.280	skirts,
2001.280	2001.560	and
2001.560	2002.160	tassels,
2002.160	2002.640	were
2002.640	2003.000	still
2003.000	2003.600	agitated
2003.600	2003.960	as
2003.960	2004.280	by
2004.280	2004.840	the
2004.840	2005.240	hot
2005.240	2005.520	vapour
2005.520	2005.680	from
2005.680	2006.080	an
2006.080	2006.200	oven.
2006.200	2006.600	“You
2006.600	2006.720	see
2006.720	2006.920	this
2006.920	2008.120	toothpick?”
2008.120	2008.360	said
2008.360	2008.720	Scrooge,
2008.720	2009.480	returning
2009.480	2009.800	quickly
2009.800	2010.600	to
2010.600	2010.920	the
2010.920	2011.200	charge,
2011.200	2011.440	for
2011.440	2011.480	the
2011.480	2011.920	reason
2011.920	2012.280	just
2012.280	2012.360	assigned;
2012.360	2012.640	and
2012.640	2012.840	wishing,
2012.840	2013.200	though
2013.200	2013.880	it
2013.880	2014.040	were
2014.040	2014.400	only
2014.400	2014.440	for
2014.440	2014.880	a
2014.880	2015.360	second,
2015.360	2015.680	to
2015.680	2015.880	divert
2015.880	2016.160	the
2016.160	2017.040	vision’s
2017.040	2017.360	stony
2017.360	2017.440	gaze
2017.440	2017.720	from
2017.720	2018.160	himself.
2018.160	2018.520	“I
2018.520	2018.720	do,”
2018.720	2019.920	replied
2019.920	2020.280	the
2020.280	2020.480	Ghost.
2020.480	2021.600	“You
2021.600	2021.880	are
2021.880	2021.920	not
2021.920	2023.080	looking
2023.080	2023.280	at
2023.280	2023.480	it,”
2023.480	2023.680	said
2023.680	2024.080	Scrooge.
2024.080	2024.200	“But
2024.200	2024.240	I
2024.240	2025.160	see
2025.160	2025.240	it,”
2025.240	2025.320	said
2025.320	2025.640	the
2025.640	2025.760	Ghost,
2025.760	2026.600	“notwithstanding.”
2026.600	2027.400	“Well!”
2027.400	2029.400	returned
2029.400	2029.400	Scrooge,
2029.400	2029.880	“I
2029.880	2030.560	have
2030.560	2030.760	but
2030.760	2031.720	to
2031.720	2032.160	swallow
2032.160	2032.320	this,
2032.320	2032.520	and
2032.520	2032.600	be
2032.600	2033.080	for
2033.080	2033.800	the
2033.800	2034.200	rest
2034.200	2034.480	of
2034.480	2034.600	my
2034.600	2034.840	days
2034.840	2035.240	persecuted
2035.240	2035.480	by
2035.480	2036.000	a
2036.000	2036.440	legion
2036.440	2036.680	of
2036.680	2036.760	goblins,
2036.760	2037.120	all
2037.120	2037.480	of
2037.480	2037.720	my
2037.720	2038.640	own
2038.640	2038.920	creation.
2038.920	2039.160	Humbug,
2039.160	2039.400	I
2039.400	2039.680	tell
2039.680	2040.600	you!
2040.600	2041.320	humbug!”
2041.320	2041.520	At
2041.520	2041.920	this
2041.920	2042.480	the
2042.480	2042.520	spirit
2042.520	2043.680	raised
2043.680	2043.880	a
2043.880	2044.360	frightful
2044.360	2044.640	cry,
2044.640	2044.760	and
2044.760	2045.240	shook
2045.240	2045.560	its
2045.560	2046.200	chain
2046.200	2046.440	with
2046.440	2046.720	such
2046.720	2046.920	a
2046.920	2047.200	dismal
2047.200	2047.520	and
2047.520	2047.880	appalling
2047.880	2048.120	noise,
2048.120	2048.440	that
2048.440	2049.000	Scrooge
2049.000	2049.400	held
2049.400	2049.880	on
2049.880	2050.240	tight
2050.240	2050.520	to
2050.520	2050.840	his
2050.840	2051.080	chair,
2051.080	2051.400	to
2051.400	2051.480	save
2051.480	2052.160	himself
2052.160	2052.480	from
2052.480	2052.800	falling
2052.800	2053.160	in
2053.160	2053.320	a
2053.320	2053.680	swoon.
2053.680	2054.000	But
2054.000	2054.040	how
2054.040	2054.400	much
2054.400	2054.720	greater
2054.720	2055.840	was
2055.840	2056.080	his
2056.080	2056.280	horror,
2056.280	2056.640	when
2056.640	2056.840	the
2056.840	2057.000	phantom
2057.000	2057.920	taking
2057.920	2058.000	off
2058.000	2058.320	the
2058.320	2058.880	bandage
2058.880	2059.160	round
2059.160	2059.400	its
2059.400	2059.520	head,
2059.520	2059.800	as
2059.800	2060.200	if
2060.200	2060.280	it
2060.280	2060.600	were
2060.600	2061.160	too
2061.160	2061.320	warm
2061.320	2061.480	to
2061.480	2061.720	wear
2061.720	2062.080	indoors,
2062.080	2062.400	its
2062.400	2062.520	lower
2062.520	2062.880	jaw
2062.880	2063.520	dropped
2063.520	2064.320	down
2064.320	2064.680	upon
2064.680	2065.120	its
2065.120	2065.880	breast!
2065.880	2066.240	Scrooge
2066.240	2066.480	fell
2066.480	2066.840	upon
2066.840	2068.280	his
2068.280	2068.560	knees,
2068.560	2068.800	and
2068.800	2069.080	clasped
2069.080	2069.440	his
2069.440	2070.200	hands
2070.200	2070.720	before
2070.720	2070.880	his
2070.880	2071.280	face.
2071.280	2071.680	“Mercy!”
2071.680	2071.840	he
2071.840	2073.320	said.
2073.320	2073.960	“Dreadful
2073.960	2074.400	apparition,
2074.400	2074.960	why
2074.960	2075.160	do
2075.160	2075.320	you
2075.320	2075.920	trouble
2075.920	2076.240	me?”
2076.240	2076.440	“Man
2076.440	2076.800	of
2076.800	2077.160	the
2077.160	2077.680	worldly
2077.680	2078.320	mind!”
2078.320	2078.680	replied
2078.680	2079.040	the
2079.040	2080.000	Ghost,
2080.000	2080.080	“do
2080.080	2080.480	you
2080.480	2080.600	believe
2080.600	2080.960	in
2080.960	2081.320	me
2081.320	2081.640	or
2081.640	2082.120	not?”
2082.120	2082.400	“I
2082.400	2082.640	do,”
2082.640	2083.920	said
2083.920	2084.000	Scrooge.
2084.000	2084.800	“I
2084.800	2084.960	must.
2084.960	2085.280	But
2085.280	2085.440	why
2085.440	2085.600	do
2085.600	2086.960	spirits
2086.960	2087.200	walk
2087.200	2087.320	the
2087.320	2087.400	earth,
2087.400	2087.920	and
2087.920	2088.240	why
2088.240	2088.440	do
2088.440	2088.560	they
2088.560	2088.720	come
2088.720	2088.960	to
2088.960	2089.120	me?”
2089.120	2089.440	“It
2089.440	2089.640	is
2089.640	2090.640	required
2090.640	2090.680	of
2090.680	2090.760	every
2090.760	2091.040	man,”
2091.040	2091.160	the
2091.160	2091.240	Ghost
2091.240	2091.320	returned,
2091.320	2091.600	and
2091.600	2091.640	travel
2091.640	2091.920	far
2091.920	2092.240	and
2092.240	2092.360	wide;
2092.360	2093.360	“that
2093.360	2093.480	the
2093.480	2093.720	spirit
2093.720	2093.960	within
2093.960	2094.920	him
2094.920	2095.520	should
2095.520	2095.960	walk
2095.960	2096.280	abroad
2096.280	2096.680	among
2096.680	2097.560	his
2097.560	2097.880	fellowmen,
2097.880	2098.440	and
2098.440	2098.920	if
2098.920	2099.600	that
2099.600	2100.960	spirit
2100.960	2101.880	goes
2101.880	2102.480	not
2102.480	2102.880	forth
2102.880	2103.440	in
2103.440	2103.840	life,
2103.840	2104.200	it
2104.200	2104.400	is
2104.400	2104.680	condemned
2104.680	2105.360	to
2105.360	2105.560	do
2105.560	2105.880	so
2105.880	2106.400	after
2106.400	2106.800	death.
2106.800	2106.840	It
2106.840	2107.120	is
2107.120	2107.800	doomed
2107.800	2108.480	to
2108.480	2108.600	wander
2108.600	2109.040	through
2109.040	2109.560	the
2109.560	2109.920	world
2109.920	2110.160	—
2110.160	2110.320	oh,
2110.320	2110.640	woe
2110.640	2111.040	is
2111.040	2111.440	me!
2111.440	2111.520	—
2111.520	2112.240	and
2112.240	2112.640	witness
2112.640	2113.440	what
2113.440	2113.440	it
2113.440	2113.760	cannot
2113.760	2114.240	share,
2114.240	2114.400	but
2114.400	2114.600	might
2114.600	2114.960	have
2114.960	2115.960	shared
2115.960	2116.240	on
2116.240	2116.480	earth,
2116.480	2116.640	and
2116.640	2117.080	turned
2117.080	2117.280	to
2117.280	2118.160	happiness!”
2118.160	2118.840	Again
2118.840	2119.000	the
2119.000	2120.600	spectre
2120.600	2120.880	raised
2120.880	2121.080	a
2121.080	2121.360	cry,
2121.360	2121.720	and
2121.720	2122.040	shook
2122.040	2122.280	its
2122.280	2123.160	chain
2123.160	2123.600	and
2123.600	2123.800	wrung
2123.800	2124.200	its
2124.200	2124.440	shadowy
2124.440	2124.960	hands.
2124.960	2125.120	“You
2125.120	2125.440	are
2125.440	2126.160	fettered,”
2126.160	2127.520	said
2127.520	2127.640	Scrooge,
2127.640	2128.640	trembling.
2128.640	2128.840	“Tell
2128.840	2129.320	me
2129.320	2130.000	why?”
2130.000	2130.840	“I
2130.840	2131.040	wear
2131.040	2131.320	the
2131.320	2132.320	chain
2132.320	2132.560	I
2132.560	2132.840	forged
2132.840	2133.040	in
2133.040	2133.560	life,”
2133.560	2134.120	replied
2134.120	2134.440	the
2134.440	2135.120	Ghost.
2135.120	2135.400	“I
2135.400	2135.680	made
2135.680	2135.720	it
2135.720	2136.720	link
2136.720	2136.880	by
2136.880	2137.120	link,
2137.120	2137.400	and
2137.400	2137.840	yard
2137.840	2138.280	by
2138.280	2139.080	yard;
2139.080	2139.320	I
2139.320	2139.920	girded
2139.920	2140.240	it
2140.240	2141.320	on
2141.320	2141.600	of
2141.600	2142.080	my
2142.080	2142.280	own
2142.280	2142.720	free
2142.720	2143.000	will,
2143.000	2143.200	and
2143.200	2143.520	of
2143.520	2144.000	my
2144.000	2144.360	own
2144.360	2144.880	free
2144.880	2145.320	will
2145.320	2145.640	I
2145.640	2145.960	wore
2145.960	2146.280	it.
2146.280	2146.640	Is
2146.640	2146.880	its
2146.880	2147.280	pattern
2147.280	2148.200	strange
2148.200	2148.320	to
2148.320	2149.120	you?”
2149.120	2150.080	Scrooge
2150.080	2150.280	trembled
2150.280	2151.440	more
2151.440	2151.840	and
2151.840	2152.120	more.
2152.120	2152.520	“Or
2152.520	2152.920	would
2152.920	2153.320	you
2153.320	2153.680	know,”
2153.680	2155.080	pursued
2155.080	2155.320	the
2155.320	2155.640	Ghost,
2155.640	2156.080	“the
2156.080	2157.120	weight
2157.120	2157.280	and
2157.280	2157.640	length
2157.640	2158.240	of
2158.240	2158.720	the
2158.720	2159.000	strong
2159.000	2159.520	coil
2159.520	2159.720	you
2159.720	2159.840	bear
2159.840	2160.680	yourself?
2160.680	2161.000	It
2161.000	2161.640	was
2161.640	2162.080	full
2162.080	2163.280	as
2163.280	2163.640	heavy
2163.640	2163.840	and
2163.840	2164.400	as
2164.400	2164.680	long
2164.680	2165.000	as
2165.000	2165.280	this,
2165.280	2165.640	seven
2165.640	2166.120	Christmas
2166.120	2166.440	Eves
2166.440	2167.440	ago.
2167.440	2167.840	You
2167.840	2168.280	have
2168.280	2168.680	laboured
2168.680	2169.080	on
2169.080	2169.920	it,
2169.920	2170.240	since.
2170.240	2170.680	It
2170.680	2170.920	is
2170.920	2171.000	a
2171.000	2172.040	ponderous
2172.040	2172.520	chain!”
2172.520	2173.080	Scrooge
2173.080	2173.640	glanced
2173.640	2175.120	about
2175.120	2175.400	him
2175.400	2175.680	on
2175.680	2175.920	the
2175.920	2176.200	floor,
2176.200	2176.320	in
2176.320	2176.480	the
2176.480	2176.920	expectation
2176.920	2177.560	of
2177.560	2177.840	finding
2177.840	2178.200	himself
2178.200	2178.400	surrounded
2178.400	2178.720	by
2178.720	2179.000	some
2179.000	2179.520	fifty
2179.520	2179.800	or
2179.800	2180.040	sixty
2180.040	2180.440	fathoms
2180.440	2180.720	of
2180.720	2181.040	iron
2181.040	2181.520	cable:
2181.520	2181.840	but
2181.840	2181.960	he
2181.960	2182.320	could
2182.320	2182.680	see
2182.680	2183.720	nothing.
2183.720	2183.920	“Jacob,”
2183.920	2184.120	he
2184.120	2184.320	said,
2184.320	2186.040	imploringly.
2186.040	2186.400	“Old
2186.400	2186.800	Jacob
2186.800	2187.120	Marley,
2187.120	2188.200	tell
2188.200	2188.760	me
2188.760	2189.040	more.
2189.040	2189.560	Speak
2189.560	2189.920	comfort
2189.920	2190.080	to
2190.080	2190.640	me,
2190.640	2191.320	Jacob!”
2191.320	2191.560	“I
2191.560	2191.720	have
2191.720	2192.200	none
2192.200	2192.200	to
2192.200	2193.120	give,”
2193.120	2193.360	the
2193.360	2193.720	Ghost
2193.720	2194.160	replied.
2194.160	2194.400	“It
2194.400	2195.240	comes
2195.240	2195.600	from
2195.600	2196.600	other
2196.600	2196.800	regions,
2196.800	2197.240	Ebenezer
2197.240	2197.520	Scrooge,
2197.520	2198.000	and
2198.000	2198.640	is
2198.640	2199.520	conveyed
2199.520	2200.400	by
2200.400	2200.600	other
2200.600	2200.960	ministers,
2200.960	2201.520	to
2201.520	2201.840	other
2201.840	2202.280	kinds
2202.280	2202.880	of
2202.880	2203.120	men.
2203.120	2203.600	Nor
2203.600	2204.280	can
2204.280	2204.280	I
2204.280	2205.480	tell
2205.480	2205.920	you
2205.920	2206.040	what
2206.040	2206.200	I
2206.200	2206.680	would.
2206.680	2206.840	A
2206.840	2207.120	very
2207.120	2207.320	little
2207.320	2207.720	more,
2207.720	2208.640	is
2208.640	2208.960	all
2208.960	2209.360	permitted
2209.360	2209.760	to
2209.760	2210.080	me.
2210.080	2210.480	I
2210.480	2211.080	cannot
2211.080	2211.200	rest,
2211.200	2211.760	I
2211.760	2212.240	cannot
2212.240	2212.640	stay,
2212.640	2213.040	I
2213.040	2213.800	cannot
2213.800	2214.280	linger
2214.280	2214.840	anywhere.
2214.840	2215.320	My
2215.320	2215.920	spirit
2215.920	2216.520	never
2216.520	2218.080	walked
2218.080	2218.600	beyond
2218.600	2218.880	our
2218.880	2219.600	counting-house
2219.600	2219.720	—
2219.720	2220.120	mark
2220.120	2220.600	me!
2220.600	2220.920	—
2220.920	2221.520	in
2221.520	2221.960	life
2221.960	2222.640	my
2222.640	2222.640	spirit
2222.640	2222.960	never
2222.960	2223.360	roved
2223.360	2223.960	beyond
2223.960	2224.160	the
2224.160	2224.600	narrow
2224.600	2225.120	limits
2225.120	2225.520	of
2225.520	2225.640	our
2225.640	2226.480	money-changing
2226.480	2226.720	hole;
2226.720	2226.840	and
2226.840	2227.480	weary
2227.480	2227.800	journeys
2227.800	2228.160	lie
2228.160	2228.960	before
2228.960	2229.800	me!”
2229.800	2230.040	It
2230.040	2230.440	was
2230.440	2230.800	a
2230.800	2232.480	habit
2232.480	2232.560	with
2232.560	2232.760	Scrooge,
2232.760	2232.960	whenever
2232.960	2233.200	he
2233.200	2233.480	became
2233.480	2234.200	thoughtful,
2234.200	2234.440	to
2234.440	2234.560	put
2234.560	2234.880	his
2234.880	2235.480	hands
2235.480	2235.880	in
2235.880	2236.040	his
2236.040	2236.160	breeches
2236.160	2236.560	pockets.
2236.560	2236.720	Pondering
2236.720	2237.160	on
2237.160	2237.480	what
2237.480	2238.640	the
2238.640	2239.320	Ghost
2239.320	2239.520	had
2239.520	2239.720	said,
2239.720	2239.800	he
2239.800	2240.080	did
2240.080	2240.400	so
2240.400	2240.680	now,
2240.680	2241.120	but
2241.120	2241.400	without
2241.400	2241.680	lifting
2241.680	2242.080	up
2242.080	2242.720	his
2242.720	2243.080	eyes,
2243.080	2243.320	or
2243.320	2243.560	getting
2243.560	2243.680	off
2243.680	2244.160	his
2244.160	2244.400	knees.
2244.400	2244.640	“You
2244.640	2244.800	must
2244.800	2245.080	have
2245.080	2246.800	been
2246.800	2247.120	very
2247.120	2247.360	slow
2247.360	2247.560	about
2247.560	2247.840	it,
2247.840	2248.320	Jacob,”
2248.320	2248.800	Scrooge
2248.800	2249.080	observed,
2249.080	2249.360	in
2249.360	2249.480	a
2249.480	2250.480	business-like
2250.480	2250.880	manner,
2250.880	2251.320	though
2251.320	2251.520	with
2251.520	2252.160	humility
2252.160	2252.600	and
2252.600	2253.200	deference.
2253.200	2253.960	“Slow!”
2253.960	2254.200	the
2254.200	2254.680	Ghost
2254.680	2256.000	repeated.
2256.000	2256.960	“Seven
2256.960	2257.280	years
2257.280	2258.800	dead,”
2258.800	2259.080	mused
2259.080	2259.680	Scrooge.
2259.680	2260.880	“And
2260.880	2261.320	travelling
2261.320	2261.760	all
2261.760	2262.520	the
2262.520	2263.000	time!”
2263.000	2263.240	“The
2263.240	2263.480	whole
2263.480	2264.120	time,”
2264.120	2264.120	said
2264.120	2265.160	the
2265.160	2265.760	Ghost.
2265.760	2266.520	“No
2266.520	2266.840	rest,
2266.840	2266.960	no
2266.960	2268.200	peace.
2268.200	2268.560	Incessant
2268.560	2270.000	torture
2270.000	2270.360	of
2270.360	2272.120	remorse.”
2272.120	2272.800	“You
2272.800	2273.120	travel
2273.120	2275.040	fast?”
2275.040	2275.160	said
2275.160	2275.600	Scrooge.
2275.600	2276.880	“On
2276.880	2276.880	the
2276.880	2277.200	wings
2277.200	2278.360	of
2278.360	2278.560	the
2278.560	2278.720	wind,”
2278.720	2279.320	replied
2279.320	2279.480	the
2279.480	2279.720	Ghost.
2279.720	2280.520	“You
2280.520	2280.920	might
2280.920	2281.040	have
2281.040	2281.400	got
2281.400	2282.560	over
2282.560	2282.760	a
2282.760	2283.000	great
2283.000	2283.240	quantity
2283.240	2283.560	of
2283.560	2283.600	ground
2283.600	2283.640	in
2283.640	2284.320	seven
2284.320	2284.760	years,”
2284.760	2285.000	said
2285.000	2285.560	Scrooge.
2285.560	2285.840	The
2285.840	2286.640	Ghost,
2286.640	2286.880	on
2286.880	2288.320	hearing
2288.320	2288.360	this,
2288.360	2288.680	set
2288.680	2289.320	up
2289.320	2289.720	another
2289.720	2290.000	cry,
2290.000	2290.440	and
2290.440	2290.640	clanked
2290.640	2291.040	its
2291.040	2291.600	chain
2291.600	2292.000	so
2292.000	2292.240	hideously
2292.240	2292.360	in
2292.360	2292.920	the
2292.920	2293.400	dead
2293.400	2294.040	silence
2294.040	2294.200	of
2294.200	2294.440	the
2294.440	2294.680	night,
2294.680	2295.000	that
2295.000	2295.200	the
2295.200	2295.400	Ward
2295.400	2295.720	would
2295.720	2296.080	have
2296.080	2296.360	been
2296.360	2296.640	justified
2296.640	2296.680	in
2296.680	2296.960	indicting
2296.960	2297.200	it
2297.200	2297.800	for
2297.800	2297.960	a
2297.960	2298.480	nuisance.
2298.480	2298.680	“Oh!
2298.680	2298.880	captive,
2298.880	2299.000	bound,
2299.000	2300.640	and
2300.640	2301.520	double-ironed,”
2301.520	2302.200	cried
2302.200	2302.440	the
2302.440	2303.000	phantom,
2303.000	2303.480	“not
2303.480	2304.000	to
2304.000	2304.040	know,
2304.040	2304.440	that
2304.440	2305.200	ages
2305.200	2305.360	of
2305.360	2305.600	incessant
2305.600	2305.840	labour,
2305.840	2306.600	by
2306.600	2306.800	immortal
2306.800	2307.400	creatures,
2307.400	2307.920	for
2307.920	2308.320	this
2308.320	2308.720	earth
2308.720	2309.240	must
2309.240	2309.440	pass
2309.440	2309.680	into
2309.680	2309.960	eternity
2309.960	2310.400	before
2310.400	2310.720	the
2310.720	2311.040	good
2311.040	2311.640	of
2311.640	2311.960	which
2311.960	2312.120	it
2312.120	2312.800	is
2312.800	2313.080	susceptible
2313.080	2313.320	is
2313.320	2313.440	all
2313.440	2314.120	developed.
2314.120	2314.360	Not
2314.360	2314.600	to
2314.600	2314.920	know
2314.920	2315.920	that
2315.920	2316.240	any
2316.240	2316.480	Christian
2316.480	2316.760	spirit
2316.760	2317.080	working
2317.080	2317.760	kindly
2317.760	2318.160	in
2318.160	2318.480	its
2318.480	2318.880	little
2318.880	2319.480	sphere,
2319.480	2319.600	whatever
2319.600	2319.880	it
2319.880	2320.160	may
2320.160	2320.760	be,
2320.760	2321.320	will
2321.320	2321.640	find
2321.640	2321.800	its
2321.800	2322.160	mortal
2322.160	2322.640	life
2322.640	2323.080	too
2323.080	2323.280	short
2323.280	2323.680	for
2323.680	2324.160	its
2324.160	2324.360	vast
2324.360	2324.920	means
2324.920	2325.080	of
2325.080	2325.440	usefulness.
2325.440	2325.800	Not
2325.800	2326.200	to
2326.200	2326.360	know
2326.360	2327.640	that
2327.640	2327.960	no
2327.960	2328.200	space
2328.200	2328.360	of
2328.360	2328.600	regret
2328.600	2328.960	can
2328.960	2329.600	make
2329.600	2329.720	amends
2329.720	2330.440	for
2330.440	2330.520	one
2330.520	2330.800	life’s
2330.800	2331.400	opportunity
2331.400	2331.920	misused!
2331.920	2332.400	Yet
2332.400	2332.880	such
2332.880	2333.280	was
2333.280	2334.000	I!
2334.000	2334.600	Oh!
2334.600	2334.920	such
2334.920	2335.080	was
2335.080	2335.640	I!”
2335.640	2336.440	“But
2336.440	2336.720	you
2336.720	2336.960	were
2336.960	2337.400	always
2337.400	2338.480	a
2338.480	2338.560	good
2338.560	2338.800	man
2338.800	2338.960	of
2338.960	2339.160	business,
2339.160	2339.480	Jacob,”
2339.480	2339.880	faltered
2339.880	2340.440	Scrooge,
2340.440	2341.000	who
2341.000	2341.560	now
2341.560	2341.960	began
2341.960	2342.840	to
2342.840	2342.960	apply
2342.960	2343.080	this
2343.080	2343.360	to
2343.360	2343.680	himself.
2343.680	2344.400	“Business!”
2344.400	2344.640	cried
2344.640	2345.200	the
2345.200	2345.680	Ghost,
2345.680	2346.320	wringing
2346.320	2346.680	its
2346.680	2346.840	hands
2346.840	2347.640	again.
2347.640	2348.120	“Mankind
2348.120	2348.600	was
2348.600	2349.200	my
2349.200	2349.560	business.
2349.560	2349.880	The
2349.880	2350.280	common
2350.280	2350.720	welfare
2350.720	2351.400	was
2351.400	2351.760	my
2351.760	2352.120	business;
2352.120	2352.800	charity,
2352.800	2353.200	mercy,
2353.200	2353.520	forbearance,
2353.520	2354.440	and
2354.440	2355.760	benevolence,
2355.760	2356.200	were,
2356.200	2356.720	all,
2356.720	2357.200	my
2357.200	2357.840	business.
2357.840	2358.480	The
2358.480	2359.520	dealings
2359.520	2360.400	of
2360.400	2361.280	my
2361.280	2361.840	trade
2361.840	2362.600	were
2362.600	2362.720	but
2362.720	2362.960	a
2362.960	2363.440	drop
2363.440	2363.760	of
2363.760	2363.840	water
2363.840	2364.080	in
2364.080	2364.280	the
2364.280	2364.760	comprehensive
2364.760	2365.040	ocean
2365.040	2365.160	of
2365.160	2365.520	my
2365.520	2366.280	business!”
2366.280	2366.880	It
2366.880	2367.320	held
2367.320	2367.960	up
2367.960	2369.200	its
2369.200	2369.280	chain
2369.280	2369.480	at
2369.480	2369.680	arm’s
2369.680	2369.840	length,
2369.840	2370.120	as
2370.120	2370.280	if
2370.280	2370.480	that
2370.480	2370.840	were
2370.840	2371.400	the
2371.400	2371.680	cause
2371.680	2372.040	of
2372.040	2372.120	all
2372.120	2372.360	its
2372.360	2372.760	unavailing
2372.760	2372.960	grief,
2372.960	2373.240	and
2373.240	2373.520	flung
2373.520	2373.960	it
2373.960	2374.600	heavily
2374.600	2375.120	upon
2375.120	2375.400	the
2375.400	2375.600	ground
2375.600	2376.040	again.
2376.040	2376.360	“At
2376.360	2376.480	this
2376.480	2376.880	time
2376.880	2378.320	of
2378.320	2378.640	the
2378.640	2378.960	rolling
2378.960	2379.360	year,”
2379.360	2379.480	the
2379.480	2379.760	spectre
2379.760	2380.160	said
2380.160	2380.600	“I
2380.600	2381.080	suffer
2381.080	2381.480	most.
2381.480	2381.800	Why
2381.800	2382.120	did
2382.120	2382.640	I
2382.640	2384.120	walk
2384.120	2384.400	through
2384.400	2384.560	crowds
2384.560	2384.720	of
2384.720	2385.160	fellow-beings
2385.160	2385.720	with
2385.720	2386.000	my
2386.000	2386.240	eyes
2386.240	2387.240	turned
2387.240	2387.360	down,
2387.360	2387.520	and
2387.520	2387.880	never
2387.880	2388.360	raise
2388.360	2388.840	them
2388.840	2389.240	to
2389.240	2389.520	that
2389.520	2389.960	blessed
2389.960	2390.200	Star
2390.200	2390.320	which
2390.320	2390.680	led
2390.680	2390.840	the
2390.840	2391.480	Wise
2391.480	2391.760	Men
2391.760	2392.000	to
2392.000	2392.080	a
2392.080	2392.360	poor
2392.360	2392.880	abode!
2392.880	2393.000	Were
2393.000	2393.360	there
2393.360	2393.520	no
2393.520	2394.680	poor
2394.680	2394.880	homes
2394.880	2395.040	to
2395.040	2395.360	which
2395.360	2395.680	its
2395.680	2396.240	light
2396.240	2396.440	would
2396.440	2396.480	have
2396.480	2396.920	conducted
2396.920	2397.400	me!”
2397.400	2397.480	Scrooge
2397.480	2398.040	was
2398.040	2398.320	very
2398.320	2399.120	much
2399.120	2399.560	dismayed
2399.560	2399.760	to
2399.760	2400.000	hear
2400.000	2400.360	the
2400.360	2400.960	spectre
2400.960	2401.080	going
2401.080	2401.200	on
2401.200	2401.320	at
2401.320	2401.680	this
2401.680	2401.680	rate,
2401.680	2401.880	and
2401.880	2402.400	began
2402.400	2402.600	to
2402.600	2403.080	quake
2403.080	2403.640	exceedingly.
2403.640	2403.880	“Hear
2403.880	2404.440	me!”
2404.440	2405.120	cried
2405.120	2405.200	the
2405.200	2406.800	Ghost.
2406.800	2407.200	“My
2407.200	2407.880	time
2407.880	2408.000	is
2408.000	2408.640	nearly
2408.640	2409.000	gone.”
2409.000	2409.320	“I
2409.320	2409.560	will,”
2409.560	2410.040	said
2410.040	2410.400	Scrooge.
2410.400	2411.320	“But
2411.320	2411.760	don’t
2411.760	2412.200	be
2412.200	2412.800	hard
2412.800	2413.200	upon
2413.200	2413.480	me!
2413.480	2413.560	Don’t
2413.560	2413.840	be
2413.840	2414.240	flowery,
2414.240	2414.600	Jacob!
2414.600	2414.960	Pray!”
2414.960	2415.400	“How
2415.400	2415.800	it
2415.800	2416.120	is
2416.120	2417.840	that
2417.840	2417.920	I
2417.920	2418.200	appear
2418.200	2418.760	before
2418.760	2418.880	you
2418.880	2419.080	in
2419.080	2419.320	a
2419.320	2420.040	shape
2420.040	2420.280	that
2420.280	2420.480	you
2420.480	2420.600	can
2420.600	2420.880	see,
2420.880	2420.880	I
2420.880	2421.160	may
2421.160	2421.240	not
2421.240	2421.480	tell.
2421.480	2421.840	I
2421.840	2422.080	have
2422.080	2422.360	sat
2422.360	2422.880	invisible
2422.880	2423.400	beside
2423.400	2423.720	you
2423.720	2423.960	many
2423.960	2424.560	and
2424.560	2424.960	many
2424.960	2425.240	a
2425.240	2426.000	day.”
2426.000	2426.240	It
2426.240	2426.680	was
2426.680	2426.960	not
2426.960	2427.840	an
2427.840	2427.960	agreeable
2427.960	2428.120	idea.
2428.120	2428.640	Scrooge
2428.640	2428.880	shivered,
2428.880	2429.200	and
2429.200	2430.480	wiped
2430.480	2431.040	the
2431.040	2431.720	perspiration
2431.720	2432.120	from
2432.120	2432.360	his
2432.360	2432.480	brow.
2432.480	2433.280	“That
2433.280	2433.400	is
2433.400	2433.520	no
2433.520	2434.040	light
2434.040	2435.240	part
2435.240	2435.600	of
2435.600	2435.920	my
2435.920	2436.280	penance,”
2436.280	2436.680	pursued
2436.680	2436.720	the
2436.720	2436.960	Ghost.
2436.960	2437.480	“I
2437.480	2437.960	am
2437.960	2438.200	here
2438.200	2439.520	to-night
2439.520	2439.800	to
2439.800	2439.920	warn
2439.920	2440.120	you,
2440.120	2440.560	that
2440.560	2440.920	you
2440.920	2441.280	have
2441.280	2441.600	yet
2441.600	2442.320	a
2442.320	2442.560	chance
2442.560	2442.800	and
2442.800	2443.080	hope
2443.080	2443.200	of
2443.200	2443.760	escaping
2443.760	2444.240	my
2444.240	2444.280	fate.
2444.280	2444.400	A
2444.400	2445.080	chance
2445.080	2445.280	and
2445.280	2445.480	hope
2445.480	2445.640	of
2445.640	2446.280	my
2446.280	2446.640	procuring,
2446.640	2447.680	Ebenezer.”
2447.680	2448.120	“You
2448.120	2448.600	were
2448.600	2449.600	always
2449.600	2450.560	a
2450.560	2450.720	good
2450.720	2451.040	friend
2451.040	2451.440	to
2451.440	2451.880	me,”
2451.880	2452.000	said
2452.000	2452.520	Scrooge.
2452.520	2452.720	“Thank
2452.720	2453.680	`ee!”
2453.680	2454.120	“You
2454.120	2454.800	will
2454.800	2455.080	be
2455.080	2455.240	haunted,”
2455.240	2456.520	resumed
2456.520	2456.760	the
2456.760	2456.880	Ghost,
2456.880	2457.880	“by
2457.880	2458.120	Three
2458.120	2458.560	Spirits.”
2458.560	2459.560	Scrooge’s
2459.560	2460.480	countenance
2460.480	2461.720	fell
2461.720	2462.120	almost
2462.120	2462.480	as
2462.480	2463.040	low
2463.040	2463.360	as
2463.360	2463.800	the
2463.800	2464.200	Ghost’s
2464.200	2464.640	had
2464.640	2464.840	done.
2464.840	2465.000	“Is
2465.000	2465.320	that
2465.320	2465.520	the
2465.520	2465.920	chance
2465.920	2466.760	and
2466.760	2467.000	hope
2467.000	2467.120	you
2467.120	2467.520	mentioned,
2467.520	2467.760	Jacob?”
2467.760	2468.120	he
2468.120	2468.360	demanded,
2468.360	2468.800	in
2468.800	2469.200	a
2469.200	2469.760	faltering
2469.760	2470.120	voice.
2470.120	2470.160	“It
2470.160	2470.560	is.”
2470.560	2470.920	“I
2470.920	2471.240	—
2471.240	2472.360	I
2472.360	2472.800	think
2472.800	2473.640	I’d
2473.640	2474.600	rather
2474.600	2475.560	not,”
2475.560	2475.800	said
2475.800	2475.960	Scrooge.
2475.960	2476.440	“Without
2476.440	2477.200	their
2477.200	2477.840	visits,”
2477.840	2478.840	said
2478.840	2479.160	the
2479.160	2479.400	Ghost,
2479.400	2480.160	“you
2480.160	2480.360	cannot
2480.360	2480.400	hope
2480.400	2481.080	to
2481.080	2481.560	shun
2481.560	2481.920	the
2481.920	2482.120	path
2482.120	2482.320	I
2482.320	2482.640	tread.
2482.640	2483.040	Expect
2483.040	2483.360	the
2483.360	2483.640	first
2483.640	2484.080	tomorrow,
2484.080	2485.440	when
2485.440	2485.560	the
2485.560	2485.880	bell
2485.880	2486.680	tolls
2486.680	2487.480	one.”
2487.480	2487.800	“Couldn’t
2487.800	2488.160	I
2488.160	2488.880	take
2488.880	2489.280	`em
2489.280	2490.480	all
2490.480	2490.640	at
2490.640	2490.880	once,
2490.880	2491.000	and
2491.000	2491.400	have
2491.400	2491.680	it
2491.680	2491.920	over,
2491.920	2492.560	Jacob?”
2492.560	2492.760	hinted
2492.760	2493.080	Scrooge.
2493.080	2494.240	“Expect
2494.240	2494.400	the
2494.400	2494.760	second
2494.760	2495.560	on
2495.560	2496.200	the
2496.200	2496.360	next
2496.360	2496.960	night
2496.960	2497.280	at
2497.280	2497.400	the
2497.400	2497.800	same
2497.800	2498.120	hour.
2498.120	2498.440	The
2498.440	2498.840	third
2498.840	2498.960	upon
2498.960	2499.360	the
2499.360	2500.160	next
2500.160	2500.800	night
2500.800	2501.360	when
2501.360	2501.520	the
2501.520	2501.880	last
2501.880	2502.400	stroke
2502.400	2502.880	of
2502.880	2503.080	twelve
2503.080	2503.480	has
2503.480	2503.840	ceased
2503.840	2504.080	to
2504.080	2504.720	vibrate.
2504.720	2504.960	Look
2504.960	2505.520	to
2505.520	2505.880	see
2505.880	2506.400	me
2506.400	2507.200	no
2507.200	2507.440	more;
2507.440	2507.720	and
2507.720	2507.920	look
2507.920	2508.040	that,
2508.040	2508.320	for
2508.320	2508.840	your
2508.840	2509.640	own
2509.640	2509.880	sake,
2509.880	2510.480	you
2510.480	2510.840	remember
2510.840	2511.000	what
2511.000	2511.480	has
2511.480	2511.880	passed
2511.880	2512.240	between
2512.240	2512.680	us!”
2512.680	2512.800	When
2512.800	2513.400	it
2513.400	2513.880	had
2513.880	2515.120	said
2515.120	2515.160	these
2515.160	2515.280	words,
2515.280	2515.400	the
2515.400	2515.800	spectre
2515.800	2516.000	took
2516.000	2516.480	its
2516.480	2516.680	wrapper
2516.680	2517.240	from
2517.240	2517.440	the
2517.440	2517.640	table,
2517.640	2517.960	and
2517.960	2518.200	bound
2518.200	2518.240	it
2518.240	2518.640	round
2518.640	2519.120	its
2519.120	2519.320	head,
2519.320	2519.480	as
2519.480	2520.000	before.
2520.000	2520.120	Scrooge
2520.120	2520.480	knew
2520.480	2520.720	this,
2520.720	2521.000	by
2521.000	2522.000	the
2522.000	2522.360	smart
2522.360	2522.600	sound
2522.600	2523.160	its
2523.160	2523.200	teeth
2523.200	2523.560	made,
2523.560	2523.920	when
2523.920	2524.200	the
2524.200	2524.440	jaws
2524.440	2524.800	were
2524.800	2525.240	brought
2525.240	2525.440	together
2525.440	2525.880	by
2525.880	2525.920	the
2525.920	2526.400	bandage.
2526.400	2526.760	He
2526.760	2527.120	ventured
2527.120	2527.240	to
2527.240	2528.520	raise
2528.520	2528.720	his
2528.720	2529.120	eyes
2529.120	2529.240	again,
2529.240	2529.440	and
2529.440	2529.680	found
2529.680	2529.960	his
2529.960	2530.560	supernatural
2530.560	2531.040	visitor
2531.040	2531.320	confronting
2531.320	2531.880	him
2531.880	2532.040	in
2532.040	2532.360	an
2532.360	2533.000	erect
2533.000	2533.400	attitude,
2533.400	2533.560	with
2533.560	2533.720	its
2533.720	2534.160	chain
2534.160	2534.800	wound
2534.800	2535.160	over
2535.160	2535.400	and
2535.400	2535.680	about
2535.680	2535.800	its
2535.800	2536.120	arm.
2536.120	2536.440	The
2536.440	2537.360	apparition
2537.360	2537.520	walked
2537.520	2538.600	backward
2538.600	2538.840	from
2538.840	2539.320	him;
2539.320	2539.480	and
2539.480	2539.840	at
2539.840	2540.120	every
2540.120	2540.320	step
2540.320	2540.520	it
2540.520	2541.360	took,
2541.360	2541.560	the
2541.560	2541.920	window
2541.920	2542.240	raised
2542.240	2542.600	itself
2542.600	2542.920	a
2542.920	2543.280	little,
2543.280	2543.680	so
2543.680	2544.000	that
2544.000	2544.320	when
2544.320	2544.480	the
2544.480	2545.360	spectre
2545.360	2545.600	reached
2545.600	2545.680	it,
2545.680	2545.720	it
2545.720	2546.200	was
2546.200	2546.560	wide
2546.560	2547.120	open.
2547.120	2547.280	It
2547.280	2547.440	beckoned
2547.440	2547.800	Scrooge
2547.800	2548.160	to
2548.160	2549.480	approach,
2549.480	2549.920	which
2549.920	2550.240	he
2550.240	2550.520	did.
2550.520	2550.840	When
2550.840	2551.520	they
2551.520	2551.640	were
2551.640	2552.040	within
2552.040	2553.160	two
2553.160	2553.360	paces
2553.360	2553.560	of
2553.560	2553.720	each
2553.720	2553.880	other,
2553.880	2554.240	Marley’s
2554.240	2554.720	Ghost
2554.720	2554.840	held
2554.840	2555.040	up
2555.040	2555.680	its
2555.680	2555.920	hand,
2555.920	2556.440	warning
2556.440	2556.680	him
2556.680	2556.840	to
2556.840	2557.160	come
2557.160	2557.920	no
2557.920	2558.240	nearer.
2558.240	2558.680	Scrooge
2558.680	2558.960	stopped.
2558.960	2559.280	Not
2559.280	2560.680	so
2560.680	2561.160	much
2561.160	2562.640	in
2562.640	2562.880	obedience,
2562.880	2563.080	as
2563.080	2563.240	in
2563.240	2563.440	surprise
2563.440	2563.800	and
2563.800	2564.520	fear:
2564.520	2564.680	for
2564.680	2565.000	on
2565.000	2565.520	the
2565.520	2565.760	raising
2565.760	2566.320	of
2566.320	2566.640	the
2566.640	2566.760	hand,
2566.760	2566.880	he
2566.880	2567.440	became
2567.440	2567.760	sensible
2567.760	2568.080	of
2568.080	2568.640	confused
2568.640	2569.040	noises
2569.040	2569.560	in
2569.560	2569.760	the
2569.760	2570.000	air;
2570.000	2570.880	incoherent
2570.880	2571.160	sounds
2571.160	2571.440	of
2571.440	2572.440	lamentation
2572.440	2572.760	and
2572.760	2573.400	regret;
2573.400	2573.680	wailings
2573.680	2574.600	inexpressibly
2574.600	2575.280	sorrowful
2575.280	2576.400	and
2576.400	2577.960	self-accusatory.
2577.960	2578.400	The
2578.400	2578.760	spectre,
2578.760	2579.040	after
2579.040	2580.000	listening
2580.000	2581.320	for
2581.320	2581.760	a
2581.760	2582.000	moment,
2582.000	2582.400	joined
2582.400	2582.640	in
2582.640	2583.120	the
2583.120	2583.160	mournful
2583.160	2584.080	dirge;
2584.080	2584.200	and
2584.200	2584.400	floated
2584.400	2584.960	out
2584.960	2585.560	upon
2585.560	2586.040	the
2586.040	2586.200	bleak,
2586.200	2586.600	dark
2586.600	2586.840	night.
2586.840	2587.200	Scrooge
2587.200	2587.920	followed
2587.920	2588.280	to
2588.280	2589.680	the
2589.680	2589.920	window:
2589.920	2590.360	desperate
2590.360	2590.520	in
2590.520	2590.680	his
2590.680	2591.520	curiosity.
2591.520	2591.960	He
2591.960	2592.080	looked
2592.080	2592.200	out.
2592.200	2592.800	The
2592.800	2593.760	air
2593.760	2594.000	was
2594.000	2595.320	filled
2595.320	2595.520	with
2595.520	2595.800	phantoms,
2595.800	2596.000	wandering
2596.000	2596.560	hither
2596.560	2596.760	and
2596.760	2597.240	thither
2597.240	2598.080	in
2598.080	2598.560	restless
2598.560	2598.800	haste,
2598.800	2599.080	and
2599.080	2599.480	moaning
2599.480	2599.800	as
2599.800	2600.160	they
2600.160	2600.800	went.
2600.800	2601.160	Every
2601.160	2601.480	one
2601.480	2601.560	of
2601.560	2601.840	them
2601.840	2602.840	wore
2602.840	2603.320	chains
2603.320	2603.520	like
2603.520	2603.760	Marley’s
2603.760	2604.000	Ghost;
2604.000	2604.400	some
2604.400	2604.600	few
2604.600	2605.040	(they
2605.040	2605.440	might
2605.440	2606.040	be
2606.040	2606.400	guilty
2606.400	2607.000	governments)
2607.000	2607.320	were
2607.320	2607.440	linked
2607.440	2607.800	together;
2607.800	2608.360	none
2608.360	2608.680	were
2608.680	2608.960	free.
2608.960	2609.240	Many
2609.240	2610.480	had
2610.480	2610.760	been
2610.760	2611.320	personally
2611.320	2612.520	known
2612.520	2612.760	to
2612.760	2612.880	Scrooge
2612.880	2613.280	in
2613.280	2613.560	their
2613.560	2613.760	lives.
2613.760	2614.320	He
2614.320	2614.600	had
2614.600	2614.720	been
2614.720	2615.200	quite
2615.200	2616.320	familiar
2616.320	2616.600	with
2616.600	2616.680	one
2616.680	2616.920	old
2616.920	2617.000	ghost,
2617.000	2617.160	in
2617.160	2617.360	a
2617.360	2617.560	white
2617.560	2617.800	waistcoat,
2617.800	2618.440	with
2618.440	2618.520	a
2618.520	2619.080	monstrous
2619.080	2619.520	iron
2619.520	2620.040	safe
2620.040	2620.160	attached
2620.160	2620.920	to
2620.920	2621.400	its
2621.400	2621.800	ankle,
2621.800	2622.160	who
2622.160	2622.440	cried
2622.440	2622.680	piteously
2622.680	2623.360	at
2623.360	2623.560	being
2623.560	2623.960	unable
2623.960	2624.280	to
2624.280	2624.480	assist
2624.480	2624.840	a
2624.840	2625.280	wretched
2625.280	2625.640	woman
2625.640	2625.920	with
2625.920	2626.200	an
2626.200	2626.360	infant,
2626.360	2626.720	whom
2626.720	2627.000	it
2627.000	2627.120	saw
2627.120	2627.160	below,
2627.160	2627.480	upon
2627.480	2628.040	a
2628.040	2628.440	door-step.
2628.440	2628.840	The
2628.840	2629.680	misery
2629.680	2629.760	with
2629.760	2630.160	them
2630.160	2631.160	all
2631.160	2631.320	was,
2631.320	2631.760	clearly,
2631.760	2632.000	that
2632.000	2632.240	they
2632.240	2632.560	sought
2632.560	2633.400	to
2633.400	2633.640	interfere,
2633.640	2634.320	for
2634.320	2634.440	good,
2634.440	2634.720	in
2634.720	2634.840	human
2634.840	2635.480	matters,
2635.480	2635.800	and
2635.800	2636.040	had
2636.040	2636.360	lost
2636.360	2636.600	the
2636.600	2636.920	power
2636.920	2637.120	for
2637.120	2637.880	ever.
2637.880	2638.280	Whether
2638.280	2638.600	these
2638.600	2638.920	creatures
2638.920	2640.280	faded
2640.280	2640.520	into
2640.520	2640.720	mist,
2640.720	2640.880	or
2640.880	2641.320	mist
2641.320	2641.840	enshrouded
2641.840	2642.120	them,
2642.120	2642.880	he
2642.880	2643.120	could
2643.120	2643.400	not
2643.400	2643.880	tell.
2643.880	2644.160	But
2644.160	2644.240	they
2644.240	2644.480	and
2644.480	2644.840	their
2644.840	2645.160	spirit
2645.160	2646.200	voices
2646.200	2646.440	faded
2646.440	2646.640	together;
2646.640	2647.280	and
2647.280	2647.680	the
2647.680	2648.000	night
2648.000	2648.440	became
2648.440	2648.600	as
2648.600	2649.240	it
2649.240	2649.440	had
2649.440	2649.760	been
2649.760	2650.160	when
2650.160	2650.360	he
2650.360	2650.440	walked
2650.440	2650.840	home.
2650.840	2651.160	Scrooge
2651.160	2651.320	closed
2651.320	2651.600	the
2651.600	2653.000	window,
2653.000	2653.240	and
2653.240	2653.640	examined
2653.640	2653.840	the
2653.840	2654.000	door
2654.000	2654.280	by
2654.280	2654.800	which
2654.800	2655.240	the
2655.240	2655.440	Ghost
2655.440	2655.560	had
2655.560	2655.840	entered.
2655.840	2656.080	It
2656.080	2656.240	was
2656.240	2656.640	double-locked,
2656.640	2656.720	as
2656.720	2657.000	he
2657.000	2657.520	had
2657.520	2657.800	locked
2657.800	2657.960	it
2657.960	2658.480	with
2658.480	2658.760	his
2658.760	2659.040	own
2659.040	2659.320	hands,
2659.320	2659.440	and
2659.440	2659.520	the
2659.520	2659.880	bolts
2659.880	2660.200	were
2660.200	2660.760	undisturbed.
2660.760	2660.800	He
2660.800	2661.360	tried
2661.360	2661.600	to
2661.600	2662.000	say
2662.000	2663.440	“Humbug!”
2663.440	2663.640	but
2663.640	2663.720	stopped
2663.720	2664.120	at
2664.120	2664.840	the
2664.840	2665.360	first
2665.360	2665.720	syllable.
2665.720	2665.920	And
2665.920	2666.120	being,
2666.120	2666.320	from
2666.320	2666.520	the
2666.520	2666.800	emotion
2666.800	2667.560	he
2667.560	2668.240	had
2668.240	2668.480	undergone,
2668.480	2668.600	or
2668.600	2669.040	the
2669.040	2669.320	fatigues
2669.320	2669.400	of
2669.400	2670.320	the
2670.320	2670.400	day,
2670.400	2670.520	or
2670.520	2671.120	his
2671.120	2671.280	glimpse
2671.280	2671.440	of
2671.440	2672.440	the
2672.440	2672.880	Invisible
2672.880	2673.200	World,
2673.200	2673.440	or
2673.440	2673.560	the
2673.560	2673.720	dull
2673.720	2674.680	conversation
2674.680	2675.040	of
2675.040	2675.400	the
2675.400	2675.440	Ghost,
2675.440	2675.760	or
2675.760	2676.400	the
2676.400	2676.560	lateness
2676.560	2676.800	of
2676.800	2677.560	the
2677.560	2677.640	hour,
2677.640	2677.880	much
2677.880	2678.360	in
2678.360	2678.640	need
2678.640	2678.880	of
2678.880	2679.520	repose;
2679.520	2680.000	went
2680.000	2680.280	straight
2680.280	2680.560	to
2680.560	2680.720	bed,
2680.720	2681.880	without
2681.880	2682.040	undressing,
2682.040	2682.440	and
2682.440	2682.560	fell
2682.560	2683.320	asleep
2683.320	2683.680	upon
2683.680	2684.040	the
2684.040	2684.920	instant.
2684.920	2704.000
